265void CBasePlayer :: Pain( void )
266{
267 float flRndSound;//sound randomizer
268
269 flRndSound = RANDOM_FLOAT ( 0 , 1 );
270
271 if ( flRndSound <= 0.33 )
272 EMIT_SOUND(ENT(pev), CHAN_VOICE, "player/pl_pain5.wav", 1, ATTN_NORM);
273 else if ( flRndSound <= 0.66 )
274 EMIT_SOUND(ENT(pev), CHAN_VOICE, "player/pl_pain6.wav", 1, ATTN_NORM);
275 else
276 EMIT_SOUND(ENT(pev), CHAN_VOICE, "player/pl_pain7.wav", 1, ATTN_NORM);
277}
278
289Vector VecVelocityForDamage(float flDamage)
290{
291 Vector vec(RANDOM_FLOAT(-100,100), RANDOM_FLOAT(-100,100), RANDOM_FLOAT(200,300));
292
293 if (flDamage > -50)
294 vec = vec * 0.7;
295 else if (flDamage > -200)
296 vec = vec * 2;
297 else
298 vec = vec * 10;
299
300 return vec;
301}

359int TrainSpeed(int iSpeed, int iMax)
360{
361 float fSpeed, fMax;
362 int iRet = 0;
363
364 fMax = (float)iMax;
365 fSpeed = iSpeed;
366
367 fSpeed = fSpeed/fMax;
368
369 if (iSpeed < 0)
370 iRet = TRAIN_BACK;
371 else if (iSpeed == 0)
372 iRet = TRAIN_NEUTRAL;
373 else if (fSpeed < 0.33)
374 iRet = TRAIN_SLOW;
375 else if (fSpeed < 0.66)
376 iRet = TRAIN_MEDIUM;
377 else
378 iRet = TRAIN_FAST;
379
380 return iRet;
381}

467void CBasePlayer :: TraceAttack( entvars_t *pevAttacker, float flDamage, Vector vecDir, TraceResult *ptr, int bitsDamageType)
468{
469 if ( pev->takedamage )
470 {
471 m_LastHitGroup = ptr->iHitgroup;
472
473 switch ( ptr->iHitgroup )
474 {
475 case HITGROUP_GENERIC:
476 break;
477 case HITGROUP_HEAD:
478 flDamage *= gSkillData.plrHead;
479 break;
480 case HITGROUP_CHEST:
481 flDamage *= gSkillData.plrChest;
482 break;
483 case HITGROUP_STOMACH:
484 flDamage *= gSkillData.plrStomach;
485 break;
486 case HITGROUP_LEFTARM:
487 case HITGROUP_RIGHTARM:
488 flDamage *= gSkillData.plrArm;
489 break;
490 case HITGROUP_LEFTLEG:
491 case HITGROUP_RIGHTLEG:
492 flDamage *= gSkillData.plrLeg;
493 break;
494 default:
495 break;
496 }
497
498 SpawnBlood(ptr->vecEndPos, BloodColor(), flDamage);// a little surface blood.
499 TraceBleed( flDamage, vecDir, ptr, bitsDamageType );
500 AddMultiDamage( pevAttacker, this, flDamage, bitsDamageType );
501 }
502}
503
504/*
505 Take some damage.
506 NOTE: each call to TakeDamage with bitsDamageType set to a time-based damage
507 type will cause the damage time countdown to be reset. Thus the ongoing effects of poison, radiation
508 etc are implemented with subsequent calls to TakeDamage using DMG_GENERIC.
509*/
510
511#define ARMOR_RATIO 0.2 // Armor Takes 80% of the damage
512#define ARMOR_BONUS 0.5 // Each Point of Armor is work 1/x points of health
513
527int CBasePlayer :: TakeDamage( entvars_t *pevInflictor, entvars_t *pevAttacker, float flDamage, int bitsDamageType )
528{
529 // have suit diagnose the problem - ie: report damage type
530 int bitsDamage = bitsDamageType;
531 int ffound = TRUE;
532 int fmajor;
533 int fcritical;
534 int fTookDamage;
535 int ftrivial;
536 float flRatio;
537 float flBonus;
538 float flHealthPrev = pev->health;
539
540 flBonus = ARMOR_BONUS;
541 flRatio = ARMOR_RATIO;
542
543 if ( ( bitsDamageType & DMG_BLAST ) && g_pGameRules->IsMultiplayer() )
544 {
545 // blasts damage armor more.
546 flBonus *= 2;
547 }
548
549 // Already dead
550 if ( !IsAlive() )
551 return 0;
552 // go take the damage first
553
554
555 CBaseEntity *pAttacker = CBaseEntity::Instance(pevAttacker);
556
557 if ( !g_pGameRules->FPlayerCanTakeDamage( this, pAttacker ) )
558 {
559 // Refuse the damage
560 return 0;
561 }
562
563 // keep track of amount of damage last sustained
564 m_lastDamageAmount = flDamage;
565
566 // Armor.
567 if (pev->armorvalue && !(bitsDamageType & (DMG_FALL | DMG_DROWN)) )// armor doesn't protect against fall or drown damage!
568 {
569 float flNew = flDamage * flRatio;
570
571 float flArmor;
572
573 flArmor = (flDamage - flNew) * flBonus;
574
575 // Does this use more armor than we have?
576 if (flArmor > pev->armorvalue)
577 {
578 flArmor = pev->armorvalue;
579 flArmor *= (1/flBonus);
580 flNew = flDamage - flArmor;
581 pev->armorvalue = 0;
582 }
583 else
584 pev->armorvalue -= flArmor;
585
586 flDamage = flNew;
587 }
588
589 // this cast to INT is critical!!! If a player ends up with 0.5 health, the engine will get that
590 // as an int (zero) and think the player is dead! (this will incite a clientside screentilt, etc)
591 fTookDamage = CBaseMonster::TakeDamage(pevInflictor, pevAttacker, (int)flDamage, bitsDamageType);
592
593 // reset damage time countdown for each type of time based damage player just sustained
594
595 {
596 for (int i = 0; i < CDMG_TIMEBASED; i++)
597 if (bitsDamageType & (DMG_PARALYZE << i))
598 m_rgbTimeBasedDamage[i] = 0;
599 }
600
601 // tell director about it
602 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_SPEC, SVC_DIRECTOR );
603 WRITE_BYTE ( 9 ); // command length in bytes
604 WRITE_BYTE ( DRC_CMD_EVENT ); // take damage event
605 WRITE_SHORT( ENTINDEX(this->edict()) ); // index number of primary entity
606 WRITE_SHORT( ENTINDEX(ENT(pevInflictor)) ); // index number of secondary entity
607 WRITE_LONG( 5 ); // eventflags (priority and flags)
608 MESSAGE_END();
609
610
611 // how bad is it, doc?
612
613 ftrivial = (pev->health > 75 || m_lastDamageAmount < 5);
614 fmajor = (m_lastDamageAmount > 25);
615 fcritical = (pev->health < 30);
616
617 // handle all bits set in this damage message,
618 // let the suit give player the diagnosis
619
620 // UNDONE: add sounds for types of damage sustained (ie: burn, shock, slash )
621
622 // UNDONE: still need to record damage and heal messages for the following types
623
624 // DMG_BURN
625 // DMG_FREEZE
626 // DMG_BLAST
627 // DMG_SHOCK
628
629 m_bitsDamageType |= bitsDamage; // Save this so we can report it to the client
630 m_bitsHUDDamage = -1; // make sure the damage bits get resent
631
632 while (fTookDamage && (!ftrivial || (bitsDamage & DMG_TIMEBASED)) && ffound && bitsDamage)
633 {
634 ffound = FALSE;
635
636 if (bitsDamage & DMG_CLUB)
637 {
638 if (fmajor)
639 SetSuitUpdate("!HEV_DMG4", FALSE, SUIT_NEXT_IN_30SEC); // minor fracture
640 bitsDamage &= ~DMG_CLUB;
641 ffound = TRUE;
642 }
643 if (bitsDamage & (DMG_FALL | DMG_CRUSH))
644 {
645 if (fmajor)
646 SetSuitUpdate("!HEV_DMG5", FALSE, SUIT_NEXT_IN_30SEC); // major fracture
647 else
648 SetSuitUpdate("!HEV_DMG4", FALSE, SUIT_NEXT_IN_30SEC); // minor fracture
649
650 bitsDamage &= ~(DMG_FALL | DMG_CRUSH);
651 ffound = TRUE;
652 }
653
654 if (bitsDamage & DMG_BULLET)
655 {
656 if (m_lastDamageAmount > 5)
657 SetSuitUpdate("!HEV_DMG6", FALSE, SUIT_NEXT_IN_30SEC); // blood loss detected
658 //else
659 // SetSuitUpdate("!HEV_DMG0", FALSE, SUIT_NEXT_IN_30SEC); // minor laceration
660
661 bitsDamage &= ~DMG_BULLET;
662 ffound = TRUE;
663 }
664
665 if (bitsDamage & DMG_SLASH)
666 {
667 if (fmajor)
668 SetSuitUpdate("!HEV_DMG1", FALSE, SUIT_NEXT_IN_30SEC); // major laceration
669 else
670 SetSuitUpdate("!HEV_DMG0", FALSE, SUIT_NEXT_IN_30SEC); // minor laceration
671
672 bitsDamage &= ~DMG_SLASH;
673 ffound = TRUE;
674 }
675
676 if (bitsDamage & DMG_SONIC)
677 {
678 if (fmajor)
679 SetSuitUpdate("!HEV_DMG2", FALSE, SUIT_NEXT_IN_1MIN); // internal bleeding
680 bitsDamage &= ~DMG_SONIC;
681 ffound = TRUE;
682 }
683
684 if (bitsDamage & (DMG_POISON | DMG_PARALYZE))
685 {
686 SetSuitUpdate("!HEV_DMG3", FALSE, SUIT_NEXT_IN_1MIN); // blood toxins detected
687 bitsDamage &= ~(DMG_POISON | DMG_PARALYZE);
688 ffound = TRUE;
689 }
690
691 if (bitsDamage & DMG_ACID)
692 {
693 SetSuitUpdate("!HEV_DET1", FALSE, SUIT_NEXT_IN_1MIN); // hazardous chemicals detected
694 bitsDamage &= ~DMG_ACID;
695 ffound = TRUE;
696 }
697
698 if (bitsDamage & DMG_NERVEGAS)
699 {
700 SetSuitUpdate("!HEV_DET0", FALSE, SUIT_NEXT_IN_1MIN); // biohazard detected
701 bitsDamage &= ~DMG_NERVEGAS;
702 ffound = TRUE;
703 }
704
705 if (bitsDamage & DMG_RADIATION)
706 {
707 SetSuitUpdate("!HEV_DET2", FALSE, SUIT_NEXT_IN_1MIN); // radiation detected
708 bitsDamage &= ~DMG_RADIATION;
709 ffound = TRUE;
710 }
711 if (bitsDamage & DMG_SHOCK)
712 {
713 bitsDamage &= ~DMG_SHOCK;
714 ffound = TRUE;
715 }
716 }
717
718 pev->punchangle.x = -2;
719
720 if (fTookDamage && !ftrivial && fmajor && flHealthPrev >= 75)
721 {
722 // first time we take major damage...
723 // turn automedic on if not on
724 SetSuitUpdate("!HEV_MED1", FALSE, SUIT_NEXT_IN_30MIN); // automedic on
725
726 // give morphine shot if not given recently
727 SetSuitUpdate("!HEV_HEAL7", FALSE, SUIT_NEXT_IN_30MIN); // morphine shot
728 }
729
730 if (fTookDamage && !ftrivial && fcritical && flHealthPrev < 75)
731 {
732
733 // already took major damage, now it's critical...
734 if (pev->health < 6)
735 SetSuitUpdate("!HEV_HLTH3", FALSE, SUIT_NEXT_IN_10MIN); // near death
736 else if (pev->health < 20)
737 SetSuitUpdate("!HEV_HLTH2", FALSE, SUIT_NEXT_IN_10MIN); // health critical
738
739 // give critical health warnings
740 if (!RANDOM_LONG(0,3) && flHealthPrev < 50)
741 SetSuitUpdate("!HEV_DMG7", FALSE, SUIT_NEXT_IN_5MIN); //seek medical attention
742 }
743
744 // if we're taking time based damage, warn about its continuing effects
745 if (fTookDamage && (bitsDamageType & DMG_TIMEBASED) && flHealthPrev < 75)
746 {
747 if (flHealthPrev < 50)
748 {
749 if (!RANDOM_LONG(0,3))
750 SetSuitUpdate("!HEV_DMG7", FALSE, SUIT_NEXT_IN_5MIN); //seek medical attention
751 }
752 else
753 SetSuitUpdate("!HEV_HLTH1", FALSE, SUIT_NEXT_IN_10MIN); // health dropping
754 }
755
756 return fTookDamage;
757}
758
766void CBasePlayer::PackDeadPlayerItems( void )
767{
768 int iWeaponRules;
769 int iAmmoRules;
770 int i;
771 CBasePlayerWeapon *rgpPackWeapons[ 20 ];// 20 hardcoded for now. How to determine exactly how many weapons we have?
772 int iPackAmmo[ MAX_AMMO_SLOTS + 1];
773 int iPW = 0;// index into packweapons array
774 int iPA = 0;// index into packammo array
775
776 memset(rgpPackWeapons, 0, sizeof(rgpPackWeapons) );
777 memset(iPackAmmo, -1, sizeof(iPackAmmo) );
778
779 // get the game rules
780 iWeaponRules = g_pGameRules->DeadPlayerWeapons( this );
781 iAmmoRules = g_pGameRules->DeadPlayerAmmo( this );
782
783 if ( iWeaponRules == GR_PLR_DROP_GUN_NO && iAmmoRules == GR_PLR_DROP_AMMO_NO )
784 {
785 // nothing to pack. Remove the weapons and return. Don't call create on the box!
786 RemoveAllItems( TRUE );
787 return;
788 }
789
790// go through all of the weapons and make a list of the ones to pack
791 for ( i = 0 ; i < MAX_ITEM_TYPES ; i++ )
792 {
793 if ( m_rgpPlayerItems[ i ] )
794 {
795 // there's a weapon here. Should I pack it?
796 CBasePlayerItem *pPlayerItem = m_rgpPlayerItems[ i ];
797
798 while ( pPlayerItem )
799 {
800 switch( iWeaponRules )
801 {
802 case GR_PLR_DROP_GUN_ACTIVE:
803 if ( m_pActiveItem && pPlayerItem == m_pActiveItem )
804 {
805 // this is the active item. Pack it.
806 rgpPackWeapons[ iPW++ ] = (CBasePlayerWeapon *)pPlayerItem;
807 }
808 break;
809
810 case GR_PLR_DROP_GUN_ALL:
811 rgpPackWeapons[ iPW++ ] = (CBasePlayerWeapon *)pPlayerItem;
812 break;
813
814 default:
815 break;
816 }
817
818 pPlayerItem = pPlayerItem->m_pNext;
819 }
820 }
821 }
822
823// now go through ammo and make a list of which types to pack.
824 if ( iAmmoRules != GR_PLR_DROP_AMMO_NO )
825 {
826 for ( i = 0 ; i < MAX_AMMO_SLOTS ; i++ )
827 {
828 if ( m_rgAmmo[ i ] > 0 )
829 {
830 // player has some ammo of this type.
831 switch ( iAmmoRules )
832 {
833 case GR_PLR_DROP_AMMO_ALL:
834 iPackAmmo[ iPA++ ] = i;
835 break;
836
837 case GR_PLR_DROP_AMMO_ACTIVE:
838 if ( m_pActiveItem && i == m_pActiveItem->PrimaryAmmoIndex() )
839 {
840 // this is the primary ammo type for the active weapon
841 iPackAmmo[ iPA++ ] = i;
842 }
843 else if ( m_pActiveItem && i == m_pActiveItem->SecondaryAmmoIndex() )
844 {
845 // this is the secondary ammo type for the active weapon
846 iPackAmmo[ iPA++ ] = i;
847 }
848 break;
849
850 default:
851 break;
852 }
853 }
854 }
855 }
856
857// create a box to pack the stuff into.
858 CWeaponBox *pWeaponBox = (CWeaponBox *)CBaseEntity::Create( "weaponbox", pev->origin, pev->angles, edict() );
859
860 pWeaponBox->pev->angles.x = 0;// don't let weaponbox tilt.
861 pWeaponBox->pev->angles.z = 0;
862
863 pWeaponBox->SetThink( &CWeaponBox::Kill );
864 pWeaponBox->pev->nextthink = gpGlobals->time + 120;
865
866// back these two lists up to their first elements
867 iPA = 0;
868 iPW = 0;
869
870// pack the ammo
871 while ( iPackAmmo[ iPA ] != -1 )
872 {
873 pWeaponBox->PackAmmo( MAKE_STRING( CBasePlayerItem::AmmoInfoArray[ iPackAmmo[ iPA ] ].pszName ), m_rgAmmo[ iPackAmmo[ iPA ] ] );
874 iPA++;
875 }
876
877// now pack all of the items in the lists
878 while ( rgpPackWeapons[ iPW ] )
879 {
880 // weapon unhooked from the player. Pack it into der box.
881 pWeaponBox->PackWeapon( rgpPackWeapons[ iPW ] );
882
883 iPW++;
884 }
885
886 pWeaponBox->pev->velocity = pev->velocity * 1.2;// weaponbox has player's velocity, then some.
887
888 RemoveAllItems( TRUE );// now strip off everything that wasn't handled by the code above.
889}
890
891void CBasePlayer::RemoveAllItems( BOOL removeSuit )
892{
893 if (m_pActiveItem)
894 {
895 ResetAutoaim( );
896 m_pActiveItem->Holster( );
897 m_pActiveItem = NULL;
898 }
899
900 m_pLastItem = NULL;
901
902 if ( m_pTank != NULL )
903 {
904 m_pTank->Use( this, this, USE_OFF, 0 );
905 m_pTank = NULL;
906 }
907
908 int i;
909 CBasePlayerItem *pPendingItem;
910 for (i = 0; i < MAX_ITEM_TYPES; i++)
911 {
912 m_pActiveItem = m_rgpPlayerItems[i];
913 while (m_pActiveItem)
914 {
915 pPendingItem = m_pActiveItem->m_pNext;
916 m_pActiveItem->Drop( );
917 m_pActiveItem = pPendingItem;
918 }
919 m_rgpPlayerItems[i] = NULL;
920 }
921 m_pActiveItem = NULL;
922
923 pev->viewmodel = 0;
924 pev->weaponmodel = 0;
925
926 if ( removeSuit )
927 pev->weapons = 0;
928 else
929 pev->weapons &= ~WEAPON_ALLWEAPONS;
930
931 for ( i = 0; i < MAX_AMMO_SLOTS;i++)
932 m_rgAmmo[i] = 0;
933
934 UpdateClientData();
935 // send Selected Weapon Message to our client
936 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgCurWeapon, NULL, pev );
937 WRITE_BYTE(0);
938 WRITE_BYTE(0);
939 WRITE_BYTE(0);
940 MESSAGE_END();
941}
942
943/*
944 * GLOBALS ASSUMED SET: g_ulModelIndexPlayer
945 *
946 * ENTITY_METHOD(PlayerDie)
947 */
948entvars_t *g_pevLastInflictor; // Set in combat.cpp. Used to pass the damage inflictor for death messages.
949 // Better solution: Add as parameter to all Killed() functions.
950
961void CBasePlayer::Killed( entvars_t *pevAttacker, int iGib )
962{
963 CSound *pSound;
964
965 // Holster weapon immediately, to allow it to cleanup
966 if ( m_pActiveItem )
967 m_pActiveItem->Holster( );
968
969 g_pGameRules->PlayerKilled( this, pevAttacker, g_pevLastInflictor );
970
971 if ( m_pTank != NULL )
972 {
973 m_pTank->Use( this, this, USE_OFF, 0 );
974 m_pTank = NULL;
975 }
976
977 // this client isn't going to be thinking for a while, so reset the sound until they respawn
978 pSound = CSoundEnt::SoundPointerForIndex( CSoundEnt::ClientSoundIndex( edict() ) );
979 {
980 if ( pSound )
981 {
982 pSound->Reset();
983 }
984 }
985
986 SetAnimation( PLAYER_DIE );
987
988 m_iRespawnFrames = 0;
989
990 pev->modelindex = g_ulModelIndexPlayer; // don't use eyes
991
992 pev->deadflag = DEAD_DYING;
993 pev->movetype = MOVETYPE_TOSS;
994 ClearBits( pev->flags, FL_ONGROUND );
995 if (pev->velocity.z < 10)
996 pev->velocity.z += RANDOM_FLOAT(0,300);
997
998 // clear out the suit message cache so we don't keep chattering
999 SetSuitUpdate(NULL, FALSE, 0);
1000
1001 // send "health" update message to zero
1002 m_iClientHealth = 0;
1003 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgHealth, NULL, pev );
1004 WRITE_BYTE( m_iClientHealth );
1005 MESSAGE_END();
1006
1007 // Tell Ammo Hud that the player is dead
1008 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgCurWeapon, NULL, pev );
1009 WRITE_BYTE(0);
1010 WRITE_BYTE(0XFF);
1011 WRITE_BYTE(0xFF);
1012 MESSAGE_END();
1013
1014 // reset FOV
1015 pev->fov = m_iFOV = m_iClientFOV = 0;
1016
1017 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgSetFOV, NULL, pev );
1018 WRITE_BYTE(0);
1019 MESSAGE_END();
1020
1021
1022 // UNDONE: Put this in, but add FFADE_PERMANENT and make fade time 8.8 instead of 4.12
1023 // UTIL_ScreenFade( edict(), Vector(128,0,0), 6, 15, 255, FFADE_OUT | FFADE_MODULATE );
1024
1025 if ( ( pev->health < -40 && iGib != GIB_NEVER ) || iGib == GIB_ALWAYS )
1026 {
1027 pev->solid = SOLID_NOT;
1028 GibMonster(); // This clears pev->model
1029 pev->effects |= EF_NODRAW;
1030 return;
1031 }
1032
1033 DeathSound();
1034
1035 pev->angles.x = 0;
1036 pev->angles.z = 0;
1037
1038 SetThink(&CBasePlayer::PlayerDeathThink);
1039 pev->nextthink = gpGlobals->time + 0.1;
1040}
1041
1051void CBasePlayer::SetAnimation( PLAYER_ANIM playerAnim )
1052{
1053 int animDesired;
1054 float speed;
1055 char szAnim[64];
1056
1057 speed = pev->velocity.Length2D();
1058
1059 if (pev->flags & FL_FROZEN)
1060 {
1061 speed = 0;
1062 playerAnim = PLAYER_IDLE;
1063 }
1064
1065 switch (playerAnim)
1066 {
1067 case PLAYER_JUMP:
1068 m_IdealActivity = ACT_HOP;
1069 break;
1070
1071 case PLAYER_SUPERJUMP:
1072 m_IdealActivity = ACT_LEAP;
1073 break;
1074
1075 case PLAYER_DIE:
1076 m_IdealActivity = ACT_DIESIMPLE;
1077 m_IdealActivity = GetDeathActivity( );
1078 break;
1079
1080 case PLAYER_ATTACK1:
1081 switch( m_Activity )
1082 {
1083 case ACT_HOVER:
1084 case ACT_SWIM:
1085 case ACT_HOP:
1086 case ACT_LEAP:
1087 case ACT_DIESIMPLE:
1088 m_IdealActivity = m_Activity;
1089 break;
1090 default:
1091 m_IdealActivity = ACT_RANGE_ATTACK1;
1092 break;
1093 }
1094 break;
1095 case PLAYER_IDLE:
1096 case PLAYER_WALK:
1097 if ( !FBitSet( pev->flags, FL_ONGROUND ) && (m_Activity == ACT_HOP || m_Activity == ACT_LEAP) ) // Still jumping
1098 {
1099 m_IdealActivity = m_Activity;
1100 }
1101 else if ( pev->waterlevel > 1 )
1102 {
1103 if ( speed == 0 )
1104 m_IdealActivity = ACT_HOVER;
1105 else
1106 m_IdealActivity = ACT_SWIM;
1107 }
1108 else
1109 {
1110 m_IdealActivity = ACT_WALK;
1111 }
1112 break;
1113 }
1114
1115 switch (m_IdealActivity)
1116 {
1117 case ACT_HOVER:
1118 case ACT_LEAP:
1119 case ACT_SWIM:
1120 case ACT_HOP:
1121 case ACT_DIESIMPLE:
1122 default:
1123 if ( m_Activity == m_IdealActivity)
1124 return;
1125 m_Activity = m_IdealActivity;
1126
1127 animDesired = LookupActivity( m_Activity );
1128 // Already using the desired animation?
1129 if (pev->sequence == animDesired)
1130 return;
1131
1132 pev->gaitsequence = 0;
1133 pev->sequence = animDesired;
1134 pev->frame = 0;
1135 ResetSequenceInfo( );
1136 return;
1137
1138 case ACT_RANGE_ATTACK1:
1139 if ( FBitSet( pev->flags, FL_DUCKING ) ) // crouching
1140 strcpy( szAnim, "crouch_shoot_" );
1141 else
1142 strcpy( szAnim, "ref_shoot_" );
1143 strcat( szAnim, m_szAnimExtention );
1144 animDesired = LookupSequence( szAnim );
1145 if (animDesired == -1)
1146 animDesired = 0;
1147
1148 if ( pev->sequence != animDesired || !m_fSequenceLoops )
1149 {
1150 pev->frame = 0;
1151 }
1152
1153 if (!m_fSequenceLoops)
1154 {
1155 pev->effects |= EF_NOINTERP;
1156 }
1157
1158 m_Activity = m_IdealActivity;
1159
1160 pev->sequence = animDesired;
1161 ResetSequenceInfo( );
1162 break;
1163
1164 case ACT_WALK:
1165 if (m_Activity != ACT_RANGE_ATTACK1 || m_fSequenceFinished)
1166 {
1167 if ( FBitSet( pev->flags, FL_DUCKING ) ) // crouching
1168 strcpy( szAnim, "crouch_aim_" );
1169 else
1170 strcpy( szAnim, "ref_aim_" );
1171 strcat( szAnim, m_szAnimExtention );
1172 animDesired = LookupSequence( szAnim );
1173 if (animDesired == -1)
1174 animDesired = 0;
1175 m_Activity = ACT_WALK;
1176 }
1177 else
1178 {
1179 animDesired = pev->sequence;
1180 }
1181 }
1182
1183 if ( FBitSet( pev->flags, FL_DUCKING ) )
1184 {
1185 if ( speed == 0)
1186 {
1187 pev->gaitsequence = LookupActivity( ACT_CROUCHIDLE );
1188 // pev->gaitsequence = LookupActivity( ACT_CROUCH );
1189 }
1190 else
1191 {
1192 pev->gaitsequence = LookupActivity( ACT_CROUCH );
1193 }
1194 }
1195 else if ( speed > 220 )
1196 {
1197 pev->gaitsequence = LookupActivity( ACT_RUN );
1198 }
1199 else if (speed > 0)
1200 {
1201 pev->gaitsequence = LookupActivity( ACT_WALK );
1202 }
1203 else
1204 {
1205 // pev->gaitsequence = LookupActivity( ACT_WALK );
1206 pev->gaitsequence = LookupSequence( "deep_idle" );
1207 }
1208
1209
1210 // Already using the desired animation?
1211 if (pev->sequence == animDesired)
1212 return;
1213
1214 //ALERT( at_console, "Set animation to %d\n", animDesired );
1215 // Reset to first frame of desired animation
1216 pev->sequence = animDesired;
1217 pev->frame = 0;
1218 ResetSequenceInfo( );
1219}

1239
1240/*
1241===========
1242WaterMove
1243============
1244*/
1245#define AIRTIME 12 // lung full of air lasts this many seconds
1246
1254void CBasePlayer::WaterMove()
1255{
1256 int air;
1257
1258 if (pev->movetype == MOVETYPE_NOCLIP)
1259 return;
1260
1261 if (pev->health < 0)
1262 return;
1263
1264 // waterlevel 0 - not in water
1265 // waterlevel 1 - feet in water
1266 // waterlevel 2 - waist in water
1267 // waterlevel 3 - head in water
1268
1269 if (pev->waterlevel != 3)
1270 {
1271 // not underwater
1272
1273 // play 'up for air' sound
1274 if (pev->air_finished < gpGlobals->time)
1275 EMIT_SOUND(ENT(pev), CHAN_VOICE, "player/pl_wade1.wav", 1, ATTN_NORM);
1276 else if (pev->air_finished < gpGlobals->time + 9)
1277 EMIT_SOUND(ENT(pev), CHAN_VOICE, "player/pl_wade2.wav", 1, ATTN_NORM);
1278
1279 pev->air_finished = gpGlobals->time + AIRTIME;
1280 pev->dmg = 2;
1281
1282 // if we took drowning damage, give it back slowly
1283 if (m_idrowndmg > m_idrownrestored)
1284 {
1285 // set drowning damage bit. hack - dmg_drownrecover actually
1286 // makes the time based damage code 'give back' health over time.
1287 // make sure counter is cleared so we start count correctly.
1288
1289 // NOTE: this actually causes the count to continue restarting
1290 // until all drowning damage is healed.
1291
1292 m_bitsDamageType |= DMG_DROWNRECOVER;
1293 m_bitsDamageType &= ~DMG_DROWN;
1294 m_rgbTimeBasedDamage[itbd_DrownRecover] = 0;
1295 }
1296
1297 }
1298 else
1299 { // fully under water
1300 // stop restoring damage while underwater
1301 m_bitsDamageType &= ~DMG_DROWNRECOVER;
1302 m_rgbTimeBasedDamage[itbd_DrownRecover] = 0;
1303
1304 if (pev->air_finished < gpGlobals->time) // drown!
1305 {
1306 if (pev->pain_finished < gpGlobals->time)
1307 {
1308 // take drowning damage
1309 pev->dmg += 1;
1310 if (pev->dmg > 5)
1311 pev->dmg = 5;
1312 TakeDamage(VARS(eoNullEntity), VARS(eoNullEntity), pev->dmg, DMG_DROWN);
1313 pev->pain_finished = gpGlobals->time + 1;
1314
1315 // track drowning damage, give it back when
1316 // player finally takes a breath
1317
1318 m_idrowndmg += pev->dmg;
1319 }
1320 }
1321 else
1322 {
1323 m_bitsDamageType &= ~DMG_DROWN;
1324 }
1325 }
1326
1327 if (!pev->waterlevel)
1328 {
1329 if (FBitSet(pev->flags, FL_INWATER))
1330 {
1331 ClearBits(pev->flags, FL_INWATER);
1332 }
1333 return;
1334 }
1335
1336 // make bubbles
1337
1338 air = (int)(pev->air_finished - gpGlobals->time);
1339 if (!RANDOM_LONG(0,0x1f) && RANDOM_LONG(0,AIRTIME-1) >= air)
1340 {
1341 switch (RANDOM_LONG(0,3))
1342 {
1343 case 0: EMIT_SOUND(ENT(pev), CHAN_BODY, "player/pl_swim1.wav", 0.8, ATTN_NORM); break;
1344 case 1: EMIT_SOUND(ENT(pev), CHAN_BODY, "player/pl_swim2.wav", 0.8, ATTN_NORM); break;
1345 case 2: EMIT_SOUND(ENT(pev), CHAN_BODY, "player/pl_swim3.wav", 0.8, ATTN_NORM); break;
1346 case 3: EMIT_SOUND(ENT(pev), CHAN_BODY, "player/pl_swim4.wav", 0.8, ATTN_NORM); break;
1347 }
1348 }
1349
1350 if (pev->watertype == CONTENT_LAVA) // do damage
1351 {
1352 if (pev->dmgtime < gpGlobals->time)
1353 TakeDamage(VARS(eoNullEntity), VARS(eoNullEntity), 10 * pev->waterlevel, DMG_BURN);
1354 }
1355 else if (pev->watertype == CONTENT_SLIME) // do damage
1356 {
1357 pev->dmgtime = gpGlobals->time + 1;
1358 TakeDamage(VARS(eoNullEntity), VARS(eoNullEntity), 4 * pev->waterlevel, DMG_ACID);
1359 }
1360
1361 if (!FBitSet(pev->flags, FL_INWATER))
1362 {
1363 SetBits(pev->flags, FL_INWATER);
1364 pev->dmgtime = 0;
1365 }
1366}

1377BOOL CBasePlayer::IsOnLadder( void )
1378{
1379 return ( pev->movetype == MOVETYPE_FLY );
1380}
1381
1388void CBasePlayer::PlayerDeathThink(void)
1389{
1390 float flForward;
1391
1392 if (FBitSet(pev->flags, FL_ONGROUND))
1393 {
1394 flForward = pev->velocity.Length() - 20;
1395 if (flForward <= 0)
1396 pev->velocity = g_vecZero;
1397 else
1398 pev->velocity = flForward * pev->velocity.Normalize();
1399 }
1400
1401 if ( HasWeapons() )
1402 {
1403 // we drop the guns here because weapons that have an area effect and can kill their user
1404 // will sometimes crash coming back from CBasePlayer::Killed() if they kill their owner because the
1405 // player class sometimes is freed. It's safer to manipulate the weapons once we know
1406 // we aren't calling into any of their code anymore through the player pointer.
1407 PackDeadPlayerItems();
1408 }
1409
1410
1411 if (pev->modelindex && (!m_fSequenceFinished) && (pev->deadflag == DEAD_DYING))
1412 {
1413 StudioFrameAdvance( );
1414
1415 m_iRespawnFrames++; // Note, these aren't necessarily real "frames", so behavior is dependent on # of client movement commands
1416 if ( m_iRespawnFrames < 120 ) // Animations should be no longer than this
1417 return;
1418 }
1419
1420 // once we're done animating our death and we're on the ground, we want to set movetype to None so our dead body won't do collisions and stuff anymore
1421 // this prevents a bug where the dead body would go to a player's head if he walked over it while the dead player was clicking their button to respawn
1422 if ( pev->movetype != MOVETYPE_NONE && FBitSet(pev->flags, FL_ONGROUND) )
1423 pev->movetype = MOVETYPE_NONE;
1424
1425 if (pev->deadflag == DEAD_DYING)
1426 pev->deadflag = DEAD_DEAD;
1427
1428 StopAnimation();
1429
1430 pev->effects |= EF_NOINTERP;
1431 pev->framerate = 0.0;
1432
1433 BOOL fAnyButtonDown = (pev->button & ~IN_SCORE );
1434
1435 // wait for all buttons released
1436 if (pev->deadflag == DEAD_DEAD)
1437 {
1438 if (fAnyButtonDown)
1439 return;
1440
1441 if ( g_pGameRules->FPlayerCanRespawn( this ) )
1442 {
1443 m_fDeadTime = gpGlobals->time;
1444 pev->deadflag = DEAD_RESPAWNABLE;
1445 }
1446
1447 return;
1448 }
1449
1450// if the player has been dead for one second longer than allowed by forcerespawn,
1451// forcerespawn isn't on. Send the player off to an intermission camera until they
1452// choose to respawn.
1453 if ( g_pGameRules->IsMultiplayer() && ( gpGlobals->time > (m_fDeadTime + 6) ) && !(m_afPhysicsFlags & PFLAG_OBSERVER) )
1454 {
1455 // go to dead camera.
1456 StartDeathCam();
1457 }
1458
1459 if ( pev->iuser1 ) // player is in spectator mode
1460 return;
1461
1462// wait for any button down, or mp_forcerespawn is set and the respawn time is up
1463 if (!fAnyButtonDown
1464 && !( g_pGameRules->IsMultiplayer() && forcerespawn.value > 0 && (gpGlobals->time > (m_fDeadTime + 5))) )
1465 return;
1466
1467 pev->button = 0;
1468 m_iRespawnFrames = 0;
1469
1470 //ALERT(at_console, "Respawn\n");
1471
1472 respawn(pev, !(m_afPhysicsFlags & PFLAG_OBSERVER) );// don't copy a corpse if we're in deathcam.
1473 pev->nextthink = -1;
1474}
1475
1483void CBasePlayer::StartDeathCam( void )
1484{
1485 edict_t *pSpot, *pNewSpot;
1486 int iRand;
1487
1488 if ( pev->view_ofs == g_vecZero )
1489 {
1490 // don't accept subsequent attempts to StartDeathCam()
1491 return;
1492 }
1493
1494 pSpot = FIND_ENTITY_BY_CLASSNAME( NULL, "info_intermission");
1495
1496 if ( !FNullEnt( pSpot ) )
1497 {
1498 // at least one intermission spot in the world.
1499 iRand = RANDOM_LONG( 0, 3 );
1500
1501 while ( iRand > 0 )
1502 {
1503 pNewSpot = FIND_ENTITY_BY_CLASSNAME( pSpot, "info_intermission");
1504
1505 if ( pNewSpot )
1506 {
1507 pSpot = pNewSpot;
1508 }
1509
1510 iRand--;
1511 }
1512
1513 CopyToBodyQue( pev );
1514
1515 UTIL_SetOrigin( pev, pSpot->v.origin );
1516 pev->angles = pev->v_angle = pSpot->v.v_angle;
1517 }
1518 else
1519 {
1520 // no intermission spot. Push them up in the air, looking down at their corpse
1521 TraceResult tr;
1522 CopyToBodyQue( pev );
1523 UTIL_TraceLine( pev->origin, pev->origin + Vector( 0, 0, 128 ), ignore_monsters, edict(), &tr );
1524
1525 UTIL_SetOrigin( pev, tr.vecEndPos );
1526 pev->angles = pev->v_angle = UTIL_VecToAngles( tr.vecEndPos - pev->origin );
1527 }
1528
1529 // start death cam
1530
1531 m_afPhysicsFlags |= PFLAG_OBSERVER;
1532 pev->view_ofs = g_vecZero;
1533 pev->fixangle = TRUE;
1534 pev->solid = SOLID_NOT;
1535 pev->takedamage = DAMAGE_NO;
1536 pev->movetype = MOVETYPE_NONE;
1537 pev->modelindex = 0;
1538}
1539
1549void CBasePlayer::StartObserver( Vector vecPosition, Vector vecViewAngle )
1550{
1551 // clear any clientside entities attached to this player
1552 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_PAS, SVC_TEMPENTITY, pev->origin );
1553 WRITE_BYTE( TE_KILLPLAYERATTACHMENTS );
1554 WRITE_BYTE( (BYTE)entindex() );
1555 MESSAGE_END();
1556
1557 // Holster weapon immediately, to allow it to cleanup
1558 if (m_pActiveItem)
1559 m_pActiveItem->Holster( );
1560
1561 if ( m_pTank != NULL )
1562 {
1563 m_pTank->Use( this, this, USE_OFF, 0 );
1564 m_pTank = NULL;
1565 }
1566
1567 // clear out the suit message cache so we don't keep chattering
1568 SetSuitUpdate(NULL, FALSE, 0);
1569
1570 // Tell Ammo Hud that the player is dead
1571 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgCurWeapon, NULL, pev );
1572 WRITE_BYTE(0);
1573 WRITE_BYTE(0XFF);
1574 WRITE_BYTE(0xFF);
1575 MESSAGE_END();
1576
1577 // reset FOV
1578 m_iFOV = m_iClientFOV = 0;
1579 pev->fov = m_iFOV;
1580 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgSetFOV, NULL, pev );
1581 WRITE_BYTE(0);
1582 MESSAGE_END();
1583
1584 // Setup flags
1585 m_iHideHUD = (HIDEHUD_HEALTH | HIDEHUD_WEAPONS);
1586 m_afPhysicsFlags |= PFLAG_OBSERVER;
1587 pev->effects = EF_NODRAW;
1588 pev->view_ofs = g_vecZero;
1589 pev->angles = pev->v_angle = vecViewAngle;
1590 pev->fixangle = TRUE;
1591 pev->solid = SOLID_NOT;
1592 pev->takedamage = DAMAGE_NO;
1593 pev->movetype = MOVETYPE_NONE;
1594 ClearBits( m_afPhysicsFlags, PFLAG_DUCKING );
1595 ClearBits( pev->flags, FL_DUCKING );
1596 pev->deadflag = DEAD_RESPAWNABLE;
1597 pev->health = 1;
1598
1599 // Clear out the status bar
1600 m_fInitHUD = TRUE;
1601
1602 pev->team = 0;
1603 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ALL, gmsgTeamInfo );
1604 WRITE_BYTE( ENTINDEX(edict()) );
1605 WRITE_STRING( "" );
1606 MESSAGE_END();
1607
1608 // Remove all the player's stuff
1609 RemoveAllItems( FALSE );
1610
1611 // Move them to the new position
1612 UTIL_SetOrigin( pev, vecPosition );
1613
1614 // Find a player to watch
1615 m_flNextObserverInput = 0;
1616 Observer_SetMode( m_iObserverLastMode );
1617}
1618
1619//
1620// PlayerUse - handles USE keypress
1621//
1622#define PLAYER_SEARCH_RADIUS (float)64
1623
1630void CBasePlayer::PlayerUse ( void )
1631{
1632 if ( IsObserver() )
1633 return;
1634
1635 // Was use pressed or released?
1636 if ( ! ((pev->button | m_afButtonPressed | m_afButtonReleased) & IN_USE) )
1637 return;
1638
1639 // Hit Use on a train?
1640 if ( m_afButtonPressed & IN_USE )
1641 {
1642 if ( m_pTank != NULL )
1643 {
1644 // Stop controlling the tank
1645 // TODO: Send HUD Update
1646 m_pTank->Use( this, this, USE_OFF, 0 );
1647 m_pTank = NULL;
1648 return;
1649 }
1650 else
1651 {
1652 if ( m_afPhysicsFlags & PFLAG_ONTRAIN )
1653 {
1654 m_afPhysicsFlags &= ~PFLAG_ONTRAIN;
1655 m_iTrain = TRAIN_NEW|TRAIN_OFF;
1656 return;
1657 }
1658 else
1659 { // Start controlling the train!
1660 CBaseEntity *pTrain = CBaseEntity::Instance( pev->groundentity );
1661
1662 if ( pTrain && !(pev->button & IN_JUMP) && FBitSet(pev->flags, FL_ONGROUND) && (pTrain->ObjectCaps() & FCAP_DIRECTIONAL_USE) && pTrain->OnControls(pev) )
1663 {
1664 m_afPhysicsFlags |= PFLAG_ONTRAIN;
1665 m_iTrain = TrainSpeed(pTrain->pev->speed, pTrain->pev->impulse);
1666 m_iTrain |= TRAIN_NEW;
1667 EMIT_SOUND( ENT(pev), CHAN_ITEM, "plats/train_use1.wav", 0.8, ATTN_NORM);
1668 return;
1669 }
1670 }
1671 }
1672 }
1673
1674 CBaseEntity *pObject = NULL;
1675 CBaseEntity *pClosest = NULL;
1676 Vector vecLOS;
1677 float flMaxDot = VIEW_FIELD_NARROW;
1678 float flDot;
1679
1680 UTIL_MakeVectors ( pev->v_angle );// so we know which way we are facing
1681
1682 while ((pObject = UTIL_FindEntityInSphere( pObject, pev->origin, PLAYER_SEARCH_RADIUS )) != NULL)
1683 {
1684
1685 if (pObject->ObjectCaps() & (FCAP_IMPULSE_USE | FCAP_CONTINUOUS_USE | FCAP_ONOFF_USE))
1686 {
1687 // !!!PERFORMANCE- should this check be done on a per case basis AFTER we've determined that
1688 // this object is actually usable? This dot is being done for every object within PLAYER_SEARCH_RADIUS
1689 // when player hits the use key. How many objects can be in that area, anyway? (sjb)
1690 vecLOS = (VecBModelOrigin( pObject->pev ) - (pev->origin + pev->view_ofs));
1691
1692 // This essentially moves the origin of the target to the corner nearest the player to test to see
1693 // if it's "hull" is in the view cone
1694 vecLOS = UTIL_ClampVectorToBox( vecLOS, pObject->pev->size * 0.5 );
1695
1696 flDot = DotProduct (vecLOS , gpGlobals->v_forward);
1697 if (flDot > flMaxDot )
1698 {// only if the item is in front of the user
1699 pClosest = pObject;
1700 flMaxDot = flDot;
1701// ALERT( at_console, "%s : %f\n", STRING( pObject->pev->classname ), flDot );
1702 }
1703// ALERT( at_console, "%s : %f\n", STRING( pObject->pev->classname ), flDot );
1704 }
1705 }
1706 pObject = pClosest;
1707
1708 // Found an object
1709 if (pObject )
1710 {
1712 int caps = pObject->ObjectCaps();
1713
1714 if ( m_afButtonPressed & IN_USE )
1715 EMIT_SOUND( ENT(pev), CHAN_ITEM, "common/wpn_select.wav", 0.4, ATTN_NORM);
1716
1717 if ( ( (pev->button & IN_USE) && (caps & FCAP_CONTINUOUS_USE) ) ||
1718 ( (m_afButtonPressed & IN_USE) && (caps & (FCAP_IMPULSE_USE|FCAP_ONOFF_USE)) ) )
1719 {
1720 if ( caps & FCAP_CONTINUOUS_USE )
1721 m_afPhysicsFlags |= PFLAG_USING;
1722
1723 pObject->Use( this, this, USE_SET, 1 );
1724 }
1725 // UNDONE: Send different USE codes for ON/OFF. Cache last ONOFF_USE object to send 'off' if you turn away
1726 else if ( (m_afButtonReleased & IN_USE) && (pObject->ObjectCaps() & FCAP_ONOFF_USE) ) // BUGBUG This is an "off" use
1727 {
1728 pObject->Use( this, this, USE_SET, 0 );
1729 }
1730 }
1731 else
1732 {
1733 if ( m_afButtonPressed & IN_USE )
1734 EMIT_SOUND( ENT(pev), CHAN_ITEM, "common/wpn_denyselect.wav", 0.4, ATTN_NORM);
1735 }
1736}
1737
1738
1745void CBasePlayer::Jump()
1746{
1747 Vector vecWallCheckDir;// direction we're tracing a line to find a wall when walljumping
1748 Vector vecAdjustedVelocity;
1749 Vector vecSpot;
1750 TraceResult tr;
1751
1752 if (FBitSet(pev->flags, FL_WATERJUMP))
1753 return;
1754
1755 if (pev->waterlevel >= 2)
1756 {
1757 return;
1758 }
1759
1760 // jump velocity is sqrt( height * gravity * 2)
1761
1762 // If this isn't the first frame pressing the jump button, break out.
1763 if ( !FBitSet( m_afButtonPressed, IN_JUMP ) )
1764 return; // don't pogo stick
1765
1766 if ( !(pev->flags & FL_ONGROUND) || !pev->groundentity )
1767 {
1768 return;
1769 }
1770
1771// many features in this function use v_forward, so makevectors now.
1772 UTIL_MakeVectors (pev->angles);
1773
1774 // ClearBits(pev->flags, FL_ONGROUND); // don't stairwalk
1775
1776 SetAnimation( PLAYER_JUMP );
1777
1778 if ( m_fLongJump &&
1779 (pev->button & IN_DUCK) &&
1780 ( pev->flDuckTime > 0 ) &&
1781 pev->velocity.Length() > 50 )
1782 {
1783 SetAnimation( PLAYER_SUPERJUMP );
1784 }
1785
1786 // If you're standing on a conveyor, add it's velocity to yours (for momentum)
1787 entvars_t *pevGround = VARS(pev->groundentity);
1788 if ( pevGround && (pevGround->flags & FL_CONVEYOR) )
1789 {
1790 pev->velocity = pev->velocity + pev->basevelocity;
1791 }
1792}

1806void FixPlayerCrouchStuck( edict_t *pPlayer )
1807{
1808 TraceResult trace;
1809
1810 // Move up as many as 18 pixels if the player is stuck.
1811 for ( int i = 0; i < 18; i++ )
1812 {
1813 UTIL_TraceHull( pPlayer->v.origin, pPlayer->v.origin, dont_ignore_monsters, head_hull, pPlayer, &trace );
1814 if ( trace.fStartSolid )
1815 pPlayer->v.origin.z ++;
1816 else
1817 break;
1818 }
1819}

1832 {
1833 SetAnimation( PLAYER_WALK );

1860void CBasePlayer::AddPoints( int score, BOOL bAllowNegativeScore )
1861{
1862 // Positive score always adds
1863 if ( score < 0 )
1864 {
1865 if ( !bAllowNegativeScore )
1866 {
1867 if ( pev->frags < 0 ) // Can't go more negative
1868 return;
1869
1870 if ( -score > pev->frags ) // Will this go negative?
1871 {
1872 score = -pev->frags; // Sum will be 0
1873 }
1874 }
1875 }
1876
1877 pev->frags += score;
1878
1879 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ALL, gmsgScoreInfo );
1880 WRITE_BYTE( ENTINDEX(edict()) );
1881 WRITE_SHORT( pev->frags );
1882 WRITE_SHORT( m_iDeaths );
1883 WRITE_SHORT( 0 );
1884 WRITE_SHORT( g_pGameRules->GetTeamIndex( m_szTeamName ) + 1 );
1885 MESSAGE_END();
1886}
1887
1897void CBasePlayer::AddPointsToTeam( int score, BOOL bAllowNegativeScore )
1898{
1899 int index = entindex();
1900
1901 for ( int i = 1; i <= gpGlobals->maxClients; i++ )
1902 {
1903 CBaseEntity *pPlayer = UTIL_PlayerByIndex( i );
1904
1905 if ( pPlayer && i != index )
1906 {
1907 if ( g_pGameRules->PlayerRelationship( this, pPlayer ) == GR_TEAMMATE )
1908 {
1909 pPlayer->AddPoints( score, bAllowNegativeScore );
1910 }
1911 }
1912 }

1921void CBasePlayer::InitStatusBar()
1922{
1923 m_flStatusBarDisappearDelay = 0;
1924 m_SbarString1[0] = m_SbarString0[0] = 0;
1925}
1926
1933void CBasePlayer::UpdateStatusBar()
1934{
1935 int newSBarState[ SBAR_END ];
1936 char sbuf0[ SBAR_STRING_SIZE ];
1937 char sbuf1[ SBAR_STRING_SIZE ];
1938
1939 memset( newSBarState, 0, sizeof(newSBarState) );
1940 strcpy( sbuf0, m_SbarString0 );
1941 strcpy( sbuf1, m_SbarString1 );
1942
1943 // Find an ID Target
1944 TraceResult tr;
1945 UTIL_MakeVectors( pev->v_angle + pev->punchangle );
1946 Vector vecSrc = EyePosition();
1947 Vector vecEnd = vecSrc + (gpGlobals->v_forward * MAX_ID_RANGE);
1948 UTIL_TraceLine( vecSrc, vecEnd, dont_ignore_monsters, edict(), &tr);
1949
1950 if (tr.flFraction != 1.0)
1951 {
1952 if ( !FNullEnt( tr.pHit ) )
1953 {
1954 CBaseEntity *pEntity = CBaseEntity::Instance( tr.pHit );
1955
1956 if (pEntity->Classify() == CLASS_PLAYER )
1957 {
1958 newSBarState[ SBAR_ID_TARGETNAME ] = ENTINDEX( pEntity->edict() );
1959 strcpy( sbuf1, "1 %p1\n2 Health: %i2%%\n3 Armor: %i3%%" );
1960
1961 // allies and medics get to see the targets health
1962 if ( g_pGameRules->PlayerRelationship( this, pEntity ) == GR_TEAMMATE )
1963 {
1964 newSBarState[ SBAR_ID_TARGETHEALTH ] = 100 * (pEntity->pev->health / pEntity->pev->max_health);
1965 newSBarState[ SBAR_ID_TARGETARMOR ] = pEntity->pev->armorvalue; //No need to get it % based since 100 it's the max.
1966 }
1967
1968 m_flStatusBarDisappearDelay = gpGlobals->time + 1.0;
1969 }
1970 }
1971 else if ( m_flStatusBarDisappearDelay > gpGlobals->time )
1972 {
1973 // hold the values for a short amount of time after viewing the object
1974 newSBarState[ SBAR_ID_TARGETNAME ] = m_izSBarState[ SBAR_ID_TARGETNAME ];
1975 newSBarState[ SBAR_ID_TARGETHEALTH ] = m_izSBarState[ SBAR_ID_TARGETHEALTH ];
1976 newSBarState[ SBAR_ID_TARGETARMOR ] = m_izSBarState[ SBAR_ID_TARGETARMOR ];
1977 }
1978 }
1979
1980 BOOL bForceResend = FALSE;
1981
1982 if ( strcmp( sbuf0, m_SbarString0 ) )
1983 {
1984 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgStatusText, NULL, pev );
1985 WRITE_BYTE( 0 );
1986 WRITE_STRING( sbuf0 );
1987 MESSAGE_END();
1988
1989 strcpy( m_SbarString0, sbuf0 );
1990
1991 // make sure everything's resent
1992 bForceResend = TRUE;
1993 }
1994
1995 if ( strcmp( sbuf1, m_SbarString1 ) )
1996 {
1997 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgStatusText, NULL, pev );
1998 WRITE_BYTE( 1 );
1999 WRITE_STRING( sbuf1 );
2000 MESSAGE_END();
2001
2002 strcpy( m_SbarString1, sbuf1 );
2003
2004 // make sure everything's resent
2005 bForceResend = TRUE;
2006 }
2007
2008 // Check values and send if they don't match
2009 for (int i = 1; i < SBAR_END; i++)
2010 {
2011 if ( newSBarState[i] != m_izSBarState[i] || bForceResend )
2012 {
2013 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgStatusValue, NULL, pev );
2014 WRITE_BYTE( i );
2015 WRITE_SHORT( newSBarState[i] );
2016 MESSAGE_END();
2017
2018 m_izSBarState[i] = newSBarState[i];
2019 }
2020 }
2021}

2031#define CLIMB_SHAKE_FREQUENCY 22 // how many frames in between screen shakes when climbing
2032#define MAX_CLIMB_SPEED 200 // fastest vertical climbing speed possible
2033#define CLIMB_SPEED_DEC 15 // climbing deceleration rate
2034#define CLIMB_PUNCH_X -7 // how far to 'punch' client X axis when climbing
2035#define CLIMB_PUNCH_Z 7 // how far to 'punch' client Z axis when climbing
2036
2045void CBasePlayer::PreThink(void)
2046{
2047 int buttonsChanged = (m_afButtonLast ^ pev->button); // These buttons have changed this frame
2048
2049 // Debounced button codes for pressed/released
2050 // UNDONE: Do we need auto-repeat?
2051 m_afButtonPressed = buttonsChanged & pev->button; // The changed ones still down are "pressed"
2052 m_afButtonReleased = buttonsChanged & (~pev->button); // The ones not down are "released"
2053
2054 g_pGameRules->PlayerThink( this );
2055
2056 if ( g_fGameOver )
2057 return; // intermission or finale
2058
2059 UTIL_MakeVectors(pev->v_angle); // is this still used?
2060
2061 ItemPreFrame( );
2062 WaterMove();
2063
2064 if ( g_pGameRules && g_pGameRules->FAllowFlashlight() )
2065 m_iHideHUD &= ~HIDEHUD_FLASHLIGHT;
2066 else
2067 m_iHideHUD |= HIDEHUD_FLASHLIGHT;
2068
2069
2070 // JOHN: checks if new client data (for HUD and view control) needs to be sent to the client
2071 UpdateClientData();
2072
2073 CheckTimeBasedDamage();
2074
2075 CheckSuitUpdate();
2076
2077 // Observer Button Handling
2078 if ( IsObserver() )
2079 {
2080 Observer_HandleButtons();
2081 Observer_CheckTarget();
2082 Observer_CheckProperties();
2083 pev->impulse = 0;
2084 return;
2085 }
2086
2087 if (pev->deadflag >= DEAD_DYING)
2088 {
2089 PlayerDeathThink();
2090 return;
2091 }
2092
2093 // So the correct flags get sent to client asap.
2094 //
2095 if ( m_afPhysicsFlags & PFLAG_ONTRAIN )
2096 pev->flags |= FL_ONTRAIN;
2097 else
2098 pev->flags &= ~FL_ONTRAIN;
2099
2100 // Train speed control
2101 if ( m_afPhysicsFlags & PFLAG_ONTRAIN )
2102 {
2103 CBaseEntity *pTrain = CBaseEntity::Instance( pev->groundentity );
2104 float vel;
2105
2106 if ( !pTrain )
2107 {
2108 TraceResult trainTrace;
2109 // Maybe this is on the other side of a level transition
2110 UTIL_TraceLine( pev->origin, pev->origin + Vector(0,0,-38), ignore_monsters, ENT(pev), &trainTrace );
2111
2112 // HACKHACK - Just look for the func_tracktrain classname
2113 if ( trainTrace.flFraction != 1.0 && trainTrace.pHit )
2114 pTrain = CBaseEntity::Instance( trainTrace.pHit );
2115
2116
2117 if ( !pTrain || !(pTrain->ObjectCaps() & FCAP_DIRECTIONAL_USE) || !pTrain->OnControls(pev) )
2118 {
2119 //ALERT( at_error, "In train mode with no train!\n" );
2120 m_afPhysicsFlags &= ~PFLAG_ONTRAIN;
2121 m_iTrain = TRAIN_NEW|TRAIN_OFF;
2122 return;
2123 }
2124 }
2125 else if ( !FBitSet( pev->flags, FL_ONGROUND ) || FBitSet( pTrain->pev->spawnflags, SF_TRACKTRAIN_NOCONTROL ) || (pev->button & (IN_MOVELEFT|IN_MOVERIGHT) ) )
2126 {
2127 // Turn off the train if you jump, strafe, or the train controls go dead
2128 m_afPhysicsFlags &= ~PFLAG_ONTRAIN;
2129 m_iTrain = TRAIN_NEW|TRAIN_OFF;
2130 return;
2131 }
2132
2133 pev->velocity = g_vecZero;
2134 vel = 0;
2135 if ( m_afButtonPressed & IN_FORWARD )
2136 {
2137 vel = 1;
2138 pTrain->Use( this, this, USE_SET, (float)vel );
2139 }
2140 else if ( m_afButtonPressed & IN_BACK )
2141 {
2142 vel = -1;
2143 pTrain->Use( this, this, USE_SET, (float)vel );
2144 }
2145
2146 if (vel)
2147 {
2148 m_iTrain = TrainSpeed(pTrain->pev->speed, pTrain->pev->impulse);
2149 m_iTrain |= TRAIN_ACTIVE|TRAIN_NEW;
2150 }
2151
2152 } else if (m_iTrain & TRAIN_ACTIVE)
2153 m_iTrain = TRAIN_NEW; // turn off train
2154
2155 if (pev->button & IN_JUMP)
2156 {
2157 // If on a ladder, jump off the ladder
2158 // else Jump
2159 Jump();
2160 }
2161
2162
2163 // If trying to duck, already ducked, or in the process of ducking
2164 if ((pev->button & IN_DUCK) || FBitSet(pev->flags,FL_DUCKING) || (m_afPhysicsFlags & PFLAG_DUCKING) )
2165 Duck();
2166
2167 if ( !FBitSet ( pev->flags, FL_ONGROUND ) )
2168 {
2169 m_flFallVelocity = -pev->velocity.z;
2170 }
2171
2172 // StudioFrameAdvance( );//!!!HACKHACK!!! Can't be hit by traceline when not animating?
2173
2174 // Clear out ladder pointer
2175 m_hEnemy = NULL;
2176
2177 if ( m_afPhysicsFlags & PFLAG_ONBARNACLE )
2178 {
2179 pev->velocity = g_vecZero;
2180 }
2181}
2182/* Time based Damage works as follows:
2183 1) There are several types of timebased damage:
2184
2185 #define DMG_PARALYZE (1 << 14) // slows affected creature down
2186 #define DMG_NERVEGAS (1 << 15) // nerve toxins, very bad
2187 #define DMG_POISON (1 << 16) // blood poisioning
2188 #define DMG_RADIATION (1 << 17) // radiation exposure
2189 #define DMG_DROWNRECOVER (1 << 18) // drown recovery
2190 #define DMG_ACID (1 << 19) // toxic chemicals or acid burns
2191 #define DMG_SLOWBURN (1 << 20) // in an oven
2192 #define DMG_SLOWFREEZE (1 << 21) // in a subzero freezer
2193
2194 2) A new hit inflicting tbd restarts the tbd counter - each monster has an 8bit counter,
2195 per damage type. The counter is decremented every second, so the maximum time
2196 an effect will last is 255/60 = 4.25 minutes. Of course, staying within the radius
2197 of a damaging effect like fire, nervegas, radiation will continually reset the counter to max.
2198
2199 3) Every second that a tbd counter is running, the player takes damage. The damage
2200 is determined by the type of tdb.
2201 Paralyze - 1/2 movement rate, 30 second duration.
2202 Nervegas - 5 points per second, 16 second duration = 80 points max dose.
2203 Poison - 2 points per second, 25 second duration = 50 points max dose.
2204 Radiation - 1 point per second, 50 second duration = 50 points max dose.
2205 Drown - 5 points per second, 2 second duration.
2206 Acid/Chemical - 5 points per second, 10 second duration = 50 points max.
2207 Burn - 10 points per second, 2 second duration.
2208 Freeze - 3 points per second, 10 second duration = 30 points max.
2209
2210 4) Certain actions or countermeasures counteract the damaging effects of tbds:
2211
2212 Armor/Heater/Cooler - Chemical(acid),burn, freeze all do damage to armor power, then to body
2213 - recharged by suit recharger
2214 Air In Lungs - drowning damage is done to air in lungs first, then to body
2215 - recharged by poking head out of water
2216 - 10 seconds if swiming fast
2217 Air In SCUBA - drowning damage is done to air in tanks first, then to body
2218 - 2 minutes in tanks. Need new tank once empty.
2219 Radiation Syringe - Each syringe full provides protection vs one radiation dosage
2220 Antitoxin Syringe - Each syringe full provides protection vs one poisoning (nervegas or poison).
2221 Health kit - Immediate stop to acid/chemical, fire or freeze damage.
2222 Radiation Shower - Immediate stop to radiation damage, acid/chemical or fire damage.
2223
2224
2225*/
2226
2227// If player is taking time based damage, continue doing damage to player -
2228// this simulates the effect of being poisoned, gassed, dosed with radiation etc -
2229// anything that continues to do damage even after the initial contact stops.
2230// Update all time based damage counters, and shut off any that are done.
2231
2232// The m_bitsDamageType bit MUST be set if any damage is to be taken.
2233// This routine will detect the initial on value of the m_bitsDamageType
2234// and init the appropriate counter. Only processes damage every second.
2235
2236//#define PARALYZE_DURATION 30 // number of 2 second intervals to take damage
2237//#define PARALYZE_DAMAGE 0.0 // damage to take each 2 second interval
2238
2239//#define NERVEGAS_DURATION 16
2240//#define NERVEGAS_DAMAGE 5.0
2241
2242//#define POISON_DURATION 25
2243//#define POISON_DAMAGE 2.0
2244
2245//#define RADIATION_DURATION 50
2246//#define RADIATION_DAMAGE 1.0
2247
2248//#define ACID_DURATION 10
2249//#define ACID_DAMAGE 5.0
2250
2251//#define SLOWBURN_DURATION 2
2252//#define SLOWBURN_DAMAGE 1.0
2253
2254//#define SLOWFREEZE_DURATION 1.0
2255//#define SLOWFREEZE_DAMAGE 3.0
2256
2257/* */
2258
2268void CBasePlayer::CheckTimeBasedDamage()
2269{
2270 int i;
2271 BYTE bDuration = 0;
2272
2273 static float gtbdPrev = 0.0;
2274
2275 if (!(m_bitsDamageType & DMG_TIMEBASED))
2276 return;
2277
2278 // only check for time based damage approx. every 2 seconds
2279 if (abs(gpGlobals->time - m_tbdPrev) < 2.0)
2280 return;
2281
2282 m_tbdPrev = gpGlobals->time;
2283
2284 for (i = 0; i < CDMG_TIMEBASED; i++)
2285 {
2286 // make sure bit is set for damage type
2287 if (m_bitsDamageType & (DMG_PARALYZE << i))
2288 {
2289 switch (i)
2290 {
2291 case itbd_Paralyze:
2292 // UNDONE - flag movement as half-speed
2293 bDuration = PARALYZE_DURATION;
2294 break;
2295 case itbd_NerveGas:
2296// TakeDamage(pev, pev, NERVEGAS_DAMAGE, DMG_GENERIC);
2297 bDuration = NERVEGAS_DURATION;
2298 break;
2299 case itbd_Poison:
2300 TakeDamage(pev, pev, POISON_DAMAGE, DMG_GENERIC);
2301 bDuration = POISON_DURATION;
2302 break;
2303 case itbd_Radiation:
2304// TakeDamage(pev, pev, RADIATION_DAMAGE, DMG_GENERIC);
2305 bDuration = RADIATION_DURATION;
2306 break;
2307 case itbd_DrownRecover:
2308 // NOTE: this hack is actually used to RESTORE health
2309 // after the player has been drowning and finally takes a breath
2310 if (m_idrowndmg > m_idrownrestored)
2311 {
2312 int idif = min(m_idrowndmg - m_idrownrestored, 10);
2313
2314 TakeHealth(idif, DMG_GENERIC);
2315 m_idrownrestored += idif;
2316 }
2317 bDuration = 4; // get up to 5*10 = 50 points back
2318 break;
2319 case itbd_Acid:
2320// TakeDamage(pev, pev, ACID_DAMAGE, DMG_GENERIC);
2321 bDuration = ACID_DURATION;
2322 break;
2323 case itbd_SlowBurn:
2324// TakeDamage(pev, pev, SLOWBURN_DAMAGE, DMG_GENERIC);
2325 bDuration = SLOWBURN_DURATION;
2326 break;
2327 case itbd_SlowFreeze:
2328// TakeDamage(pev, pev, SLOWFREEZE_DAMAGE, DMG_GENERIC);
2329 bDuration = SLOWFREEZE_DURATION;
2330 break;
2331 default:
2332 bDuration = 0;
2333 }
2334
2335 if (m_rgbTimeBasedDamage[i])
2336 {
2337 // use up an antitoxin on poison or nervegas after a few seconds of damage
2338 if (((i == itbd_NerveGas) && (m_rgbTimeBasedDamage[i] < NERVEGAS_DURATION)) ||
2339 ((i == itbd_Poison) && (m_rgbTimeBasedDamage[i] < POISON_DURATION)))
2340 {
2341 if (m_rgItems[ITEM_ANTIDOTE])
2342 {
2343 m_rgbTimeBasedDamage[i] = 0;
2344 m_rgItems[ITEM_ANTIDOTE]--;
2345 SetSuitUpdate("!HEV_HEAL4", FALSE, SUIT_REPEAT_OK);
2346 }
2347 }
2348
2349
2350 // decrement damage duration, detect when done.
2351 if (!m_rgbTimeBasedDamage[i] || --m_rgbTimeBasedDamage[i] == 0)
2352 {
2353 m_rgbTimeBasedDamage[i] = 0;
2354 // if we're done, clear damage bits
2355 m_bitsDamageType &= ~(DMG_PARALYZE << i);
2356 }
2357 }
2358 else
2359 // first time taking this damage type - init damage duration
2360 m_rgbTimeBasedDamage[i] = bDuration;
2361 }
2362 }
2363}
2364
2365/*
2366THE POWER SUIT
2367
2368The Suit provides 3 main functions: Protection, Notification and Augmentation.
2369Some functions are automatic, some require power.
2370The player gets the suit shortly after getting off the train in C1A0 and it stays
2371with him for the entire game.
2372
2373Protection
2374
2375 Heat/Cold
2376 When the player enters a hot/cold area, the heating/cooling indicator on the suit
2377 will come on and the battery will drain while the player stays in the area.
2378 After the battery is dead, the player starts to take damage.
2379 This feature is built into the suit and is automatically engaged.
2380 Radiation Syringe
2381 This will cause the player to be immune from the effects of radiation for N seconds. Single use item.
2382 Anti-Toxin Syringe
2383 This will cure the player from being poisoned. Single use item.
2384 Health
2385 Small (1st aid kits, food, etc.)
2386 Large (boxes on walls)
2387 Armor
2388 The armor works using energy to create a protective field that deflects a
2389 percentage of damage projectile and explosive attacks. After the armor has been deployed,
2390 it will attempt to recharge itself to full capacity with the energy reserves from the battery.
2391 It takes the armor N seconds to fully charge.
2392
2393Notification (via the HUD)
2394
2395x Health
2396x Ammo
2397x Automatic Health Care
2398 Notifies the player when automatic healing has been engaged.
2399x Geiger counter
2400 Classic Geiger counter sound and status bar at top of HUD
2401 alerts player to dangerous levels of radiation. This is not visible when radiation levels are normal.
2402x Poison
2403 Armor
2404 Displays the current level of armor.
2405
2406Augmentation
2407
2408 Reanimation (w/adrenaline)
2409 Causes the player to come back to life after he has been dead for 3 seconds.
2410 Will not work if player was gibbed. Single use.
2411 Long Jump
2412 Used by hitting the ??? key(s). Caused the player to further than normal.
2413 SCUBA
2414 Used automatically after picked up and after player enters the water.
2415 Works for N seconds. Single use.
2416
2417Things powered by the battery
2418
2419 Armor
2420 Uses N watts for every M units of damage.
2421 Heat/Cool
2422 Uses N watts for every second in hot/cold area.
2423 Long Jump
2424 Uses N watts for every jump.
2425 Alien Cloak
2426 Uses N watts for each use. Each use lasts M seconds.
2427 Alien Shield
2428 Augments armor. Reduces Armor drain by one half
2429
2430*/
2431
2432// if in range of radiation source, ping geiger counter
2433
2434#define GEIGERDELAY 0.25
2435
2443void CBasePlayer :: UpdateGeigerCounter( void )
2444{
2445 BYTE range;
2446
2447 // delay per update ie: don't flood net with these msgs
2448 if (gpGlobals->time < m_flgeigerDelay)
2449 return;
2450
2451 m_flgeigerDelay = gpGlobals->time + GEIGERDELAY;
2452
2453 // send range to radition source to client
2454
2455 range = (BYTE) (m_flgeigerRange / 4);
2456
2457 if (range != m_igeigerRangePrev)
2458 {
2459 m_igeigerRangePrev = range;
2460
2461 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgGeigerRange, NULL, pev );
2462 WRITE_BYTE( range );
2463 MESSAGE_END();
2464 }
2465
2466 // reset counter and semaphore
2467 if (!RANDOM_LONG(0,3))
2468 m_flgeigerRange = 1000;
2469
2470}
2471
2472/*
2473================
2474CheckSuitUpdate
2475
2476Play suit update if it's time
2477================
2478*/
2479
2480#define SUITUPDATETIME 3.5
2481#define SUITFIRSTUPDATETIME 0.1
2482
2489void CBasePlayer::CheckSuitUpdate()
2490{
2491 int i;
2492 int isentence = 0;
2493 int isearch = m_iSuitPlayNext;
2494
2495 // Ignore suit updates if no suit
2496 if ( !(pev->weapons & (1<<WEAPON_SUIT)) )
2497 return;
2498
2499 // if in range of radiation source, ping geiger counter
2500 UpdateGeigerCounter();
2501
2502 if ( g_pGameRules->IsMultiplayer() )
2503 {
2504 // don't bother updating HEV voice in multiplayer.
2505 return;
2506 }
2507
2508 if ( gpGlobals->time >= m_flSuitUpdate && m_flSuitUpdate > 0)
2509 {
2510 // play a sentence off of the end of the queue
2511 for (i = 0; i < CSUITPLAYLIST; i++)
2512 {
2513 if (isentence = m_rgSuitPlayList[isearch])
2514 break;
2515
2516 if (++isearch == CSUITPLAYLIST)
2517 isearch = 0;
2518 }
2519
2520 if (isentence)
2521 {
2522 m_rgSuitPlayList[isearch] = 0;
2523 if (isentence > 0)
2524 {
2525 // play sentence number
2526
2527 char sentence[CBSENTENCENAME_MAX+1];
2528 strcpy(sentence, "!");
2529 strcat(sentence, gszallsentencenames[isentence]);
2530 EMIT_SOUND_SUIT(ENT(pev), sentence);
2531 }
2532 else
2533 {
2534 // play sentence group
2535 EMIT_GROUPID_SUIT(ENT(pev), -isentence);
2536 }
2537 m_flSuitUpdate = gpGlobals->time + SUITUPDATETIME;
2538 }
2539 else
2540 // queue is empty, don't check
2541 m_flSuitUpdate = 0;
2542 }
2543}
2544
2545// add sentence to suit playlist queue. if fgroup is true, then
2546// name is a sentence group (HEV_AA), otherwise name is a specific
2547// sentence name ie: !HEV_AA0. If iNoRepeat is specified in
2548// seconds, then we won't repeat playback of this word or sentence
2549// for at least that number of seconds.
2550
2562void CBasePlayer::SetSuitUpdate(char *name, int fgroup, int iNoRepeatTime)
2563{
2564 int i;
2565 int isentence;
2566 int iempty = -1;
2567
2568
2569 // Ignore suit updates if no suit
2570 if ( !(pev->weapons & (1<<WEAPON_SUIT)) )
2571 return;
2572
2573 if ( g_pGameRules->IsMultiplayer() )
2574 {
2575 // due to static channel design, etc. We don't play HEV sounds in multiplayer right now.
2576 return;
2577 }
2578
2579 // if name == NULL, then clear out the queue
2580
2581 if (!name)
2582 {
2583 for (i = 0; i < CSUITPLAYLIST; i++)
2584 m_rgSuitPlayList[i] = 0;
2585 return;
2586 }
2587 // get sentence or group number
2588 if (!fgroup)
2589 {
2590 isentence = SENTENCEG_Lookup(name, NULL);
2591 if (isentence < 0)
2592 return;
2593 }
2594 else
2595 // mark group number as negative
2596 isentence = -SENTENCEG_GetIndex(name);
2597
2598 // check norepeat list - this list lets us cancel
2599 // the playback of words or sentences that have already
2600 // been played within a certain time.
2601
2602 for (i = 0; i < CSUITNOREPEAT; i++)
2603 {
2604 if (isentence == m_rgiSuitNoRepeat[i])
2605 {
2606 // this sentence or group is already in
2607 // the norepeat list
2608
2609 if (m_rgflSuitNoRepeatTime[i] < gpGlobals->time)
2610 {
2611 // norepeat time has expired, clear it out
2612 m_rgiSuitNoRepeat[i] = 0;
2613 m_rgflSuitNoRepeatTime[i] = 0.0;
2614 iempty = i;
2615 break;
2616 }
2617 else
2618 {
2619 // don't play, still marked as norepeat
2620 return;
2621 }
2622 }
2623 // keep track of empty slot
2624 if (!m_rgiSuitNoRepeat[i])
2625 iempty = i;
2626 }
2627
2628 // sentence is not in norepeat list, save if norepeat time was given
2629
2630 if (iNoRepeatTime)
2631 {
2632 if (iempty < 0)
2633 iempty = RANDOM_LONG(0, CSUITNOREPEAT-1); // pick random slot to take over
2634 m_rgiSuitNoRepeat[iempty] = isentence;
2635 m_rgflSuitNoRepeatTime[iempty] = iNoRepeatTime + gpGlobals->time;
2636 }
2637
2638 // find empty spot in queue, or overwrite last spot
2639
2640 m_rgSuitPlayList[m_iSuitPlayNext++] = isentence;
2641 if (m_iSuitPlayNext == CSUITPLAYLIST)
2642 m_iSuitPlayNext = 0;
2643
2644 if (m_flSuitUpdate <= gpGlobals->time)
2645 {
2646 if (m_flSuitUpdate == 0)
2647 // play queue is empty, don't delay too long before playback
2648 m_flSuitUpdate = gpGlobals->time + SUITFIRSTUPDATETIME;
2649 else
2650 m_flSuitUpdate = gpGlobals->time + SUITUPDATETIME;
2651 }
2652
2653}
2654
2663static void CheckPowerups(entvars_t *pev)
2664{
2665 if (pev->health <= 0)
2666 return;
2667
2668 pev->modelindex = g_ulModelIndexPlayer; // don't use eyes
2669}
2670
2671
2679void CBasePlayer :: UpdatePlayerSound ( void )
2680{
2681 int iBodyVolume;
2682 int iVolume;
2683 CSound *pSound;
2684
2685 pSound = CSoundEnt::SoundPointerForIndex( CSoundEnt :: ClientSoundIndex( edict() ) );
2686
2687 if ( !pSound )
2688 {
2689 ALERT ( at_console, "Client lost reserved sound!\n" );
2690 return;
2691 }
2692
2693 pSound->m_iType = bits_SOUND_NONE;
2694
2695 // now calculate the best target volume for the sound. If the player's weapon
2696 // is louder than his body/movement, use the weapon volume, else, use the body volume.
2697
2698 if ( FBitSet ( pev->flags, FL_ONGROUND ) )
2699 {
2700 iBodyVolume = pev->velocity.Length();
2701
2702 // clamp the noise that can be made by the body, in case a push trigger,
2703 // weapon recoil, or anything shoves the player abnormally fast.
2704 if ( iBodyVolume > 512 )
2705 {
2706 iBodyVolume = 512;
2707 }
2708 }
2709 else
2710 {
2711 iBodyVolume = 0;
2712 }
2713
2714 if ( pev->button & IN_JUMP )
2715 {
2716 iBodyVolume += 100;
2717 }
2718
2719// convert player move speed and actions into sound audible by monsters.
2720 if ( m_iWeaponVolume > iBodyVolume )
2721 {
2722 m_iTargetVolume = m_iWeaponVolume;
2723
2724 // OR in the bits for COMBAT sound if the weapon is being louder than the player.
2725 pSound->m_iType |= bits_SOUND_COMBAT;
2726 }
2727 else
2728 {
2729 m_iTargetVolume = iBodyVolume;
2730 }
2731
2732 // decay weapon volume over time so bits_SOUND_COMBAT stays set for a while
2733 m_iWeaponVolume -= 250 * gpGlobals->frametime;
2734 if ( m_iWeaponVolume < 0 )
2735 {
2736 iVolume = 0;
2737 }
2738
2739
2740 // if target volume is greater than the player sound's current volume, we paste the new volume in
2741 // immediately. If target is less than the current volume, current volume is not set immediately to the
2742 // lower volume, rather works itself towards target volume over time. This gives monsters a much better chance
2743 // to hear a sound, especially if they don't listen every frame.
2744 iVolume = pSound->m_iVolume;
2745
2746 if ( m_iTargetVolume > iVolume )
2747 {
2748 iVolume = m_iTargetVolume;
2749 }
2750 else if ( iVolume > m_iTargetVolume )
2751 {
2752 iVolume -= 250 * gpGlobals->frametime;
2753
2754 if ( iVolume < m_iTargetVolume )
2755 {
2756 iVolume = 0;
2757 }
2758 }
2759
2760 if ( m_fNoPlayerSound )
2761 {
2762 // debugging flag, lets players move around and shoot without monsters hearing.
2763 iVolume = 0;
2764 }
2765
2766 if ( gpGlobals->time > m_flStopExtraSoundTime )
2767 {
2768 // since the extra sound that a weapon emits only lasts for one client frame, we keep that sound around for a server frame or two
2769 // after actual emission to make sure it gets heard.
2770 m_iExtraSoundTypes = 0;
2771 }
2772
2773 if ( pSound )
2774 {
2775 pSound->m_vecOrigin = pev->origin;
2776 pSound->m_iType |= ( bits_SOUND_PLAYER | m_iExtraSoundTypes );
2777 pSound->m_iVolume = iVolume;
2778 }
2779
2780 // keep track of virtual muzzle flash
2781 m_iWeaponFlash -= 256 * gpGlobals->frametime;
2782 if (m_iWeaponFlash < 0)
2783 m_iWeaponFlash = 0;
2784
2785 //UTIL_MakeVectors ( pev->angles );
2786 //gpGlobals->v_forward.z = 0;
2787
2788 // Below are a couple of useful little bits that make it easier to determine just how much noise the
2789 // player is making.
2790 // UTIL_ParticleEffect ( pev->origin + gpGlobals->v_forward * iVolume, g_vecZero, 255, 25 );
2791 //ALERT ( at_console, "%d/%d\n", iVolume, m_iTargetVolume );
2792}
2793
2801void CBasePlayer::PostThink()
2802{
2803 if ( g_fGameOver )
2804 goto pt_end; // intermission or finale
2805
2806 if (!IsAlive())
2807 goto pt_end;
2808
2809 // Handle Tank controlling
2810 if ( m_pTank != NULL )
2811 { // if they've moved too far from the gun, or selected a weapon, unuse the gun
2812 if ( m_pTank->OnControls( pev ) && !pev->weaponmodel )
2813 {
2814 m_pTank->Use( this, this, USE_SET, 2 ); // try fire the gun
2815 }
2816 else
2817 { // they've moved off the platform
2818 m_pTank->Use( this, this, USE_OFF, 0 );
2819 m_pTank = NULL;
2820 }
2821 }
2822
2823// do weapon stuff
2824 ItemPostFrame( );
2825
2826// check to see if player landed hard enough to make a sound
2827// falling farther than half of the maximum safe distance, but not as far a max safe distance will
2828// play a bootscrape sound, and no damage will be inflicted. Fallling a distance shorter than half
2829// of maximum safe distance will make no sound. Falling farther than max safe distance will play a
2830// fallpain sound, and damage will be inflicted based on how far the player fell
2831
2832 if ( (FBitSet(pev->flags, FL_ONGROUND)) && (pev->health > 0) && m_flFallVelocity >= PLAYER_FALL_PUNCH_THRESHHOLD )
2833 {
2834 // ALERT ( at_console, "%f\n", m_flFallVelocity );
2835
2836 if (pev->watertype == CONTENT_WATER)
2837 {
2838 // Did he hit the world or a non-moving entity?
2839 // BUG - this happens all the time in water, especially when
2840 // BUG - water has current force
2841 // if ( !pev->groundentity || VARS(pev->groundentity)->velocity.z == 0 )
2842 // EMIT_SOUND(ENT(pev), CHAN_BODY, "player/pl_wade1.wav", 1, ATTN_NORM);
2843 }
2844 else if ( m_flFallVelocity > PLAYER_MAX_SAFE_FALL_SPEED )
2845 {// after this point, we start doing damage
2846
2847 float flFallDamage = g_pGameRules->FlPlayerFallDamage( this );
2848
2849 if ( flFallDamage > pev->health )
2850 {//splat
2851 // note: play on item channel because we play footstep landing on body channel
2852 EMIT_SOUND(ENT(pev), CHAN_ITEM, "common/bodysplat.wav", 1, ATTN_NORM);
2853 }
2854
2855 if ( flFallDamage > 0 )
2856 {
2857 TakeDamage(VARS(eoNullEntity), VARS(eoNullEntity), flFallDamage, DMG_FALL );
2858 pev->punchangle.x = 0;
2859 }
2860 }
2861
2862 if ( IsAlive() )
2863 {
2864 SetAnimation( PLAYER_WALK );
2865 }
2866 }
2867
2868 if (FBitSet(pev->flags, FL_ONGROUND))
2869 {
2870 if (m_flFallVelocity > 64 && !g_pGameRules->IsMultiplayer())
2871 {
2872 CSoundEnt::InsertSound ( bits_SOUND_PLAYER, pev->origin, m_flFallVelocity, 0.2 );
2873 // ALERT( at_console, "fall %f\n", m_flFallVelocity );
2874 }
2875 m_flFallVelocity = 0;
2876 }
2877
2878 // select the proper animation for the player character
2879 if ( IsAlive() )
2880 {
2881 if (!pev->velocity.x && !pev->velocity.y)
2882 SetAnimation( PLAYER_IDLE );
2883 else if ((pev->velocity.x || pev->velocity.y) && (FBitSet(pev->flags, FL_ONGROUND)))
2884 SetAnimation( PLAYER_WALK );
2885 else if (pev->waterlevel > 1)
2886 SetAnimation( PLAYER_WALK );
2887 }
2888
2889 StudioFrameAdvance( );
2890 CheckPowerups(pev);
2891
2892 UpdatePlayerSound();
2893
2894pt_end:
2895#if defined( CLIENT_WEAPONS )
2896 // Decay timers on weapons
2897 // go through all of the weapons and make a list of the ones to pack
2898 for ( int i = 0 ; i < MAX_ITEM_TYPES ; i++ )
2899 {
2900 if ( m_rgpPlayerItems[ i ] )
2901 {
2902 CBasePlayerItem *pPlayerItem = m_rgpPlayerItems[ i ];
2903
2904 while ( pPlayerItem )
2905 {
2906 CBasePlayerWeapon *gun;
2907
2908 gun = (CBasePlayerWeapon *)pPlayerItem->GetWeaponPtr();
2909
2910 if ( gun && gun->UseDecrement() )
2911 {
2912 gun->m_flNextPrimaryAttack = max( gun->m_flNextPrimaryAttack - gpGlobals->frametime, -1.0 );
2913 gun->m_flNextSecondaryAttack = max( gun->m_flNextSecondaryAttack - gpGlobals->frametime, -0.001 );
2914
2915 if ( gun->m_flTimeWeaponIdle != 1000 )
2916 {
2917 gun->m_flTimeWeaponIdle = max( gun->m_flTimeWeaponIdle - gpGlobals->frametime, -0.001 );
2918 }
2919
2920 if ( gun->pev->fuser1 != 1000 )
2921 {
2922 gun->pev->fuser1 = max( gun->pev->fuser1 - gpGlobals->frametime, -0.001 );
2923 }
2924
2925 // Only decrement if not flagged as NO_DECREMENT
2926// if ( gun->m_flPumpTime != 1000 )
2927 // {
2928 // gun->m_flPumpTime = max( gun->m_flPumpTime - gpGlobals->frametime, -0.001 );
2929 // }
2930
2931 }
2932
2933 pPlayerItem = pPlayerItem->m_pNext;
2934 }
2935 }
2936 }
2937
2938 m_flNextAttack -= gpGlobals->frametime;
2939 if ( m_flNextAttack < -0.001 )
2940 m_flNextAttack = -0.001;
2941
2942 if ( m_flNextAmmoBurn != 1000 )
2943 {
2944 m_flNextAmmoBurn -= gpGlobals->frametime;
2945
2946 if ( m_flNextAmmoBurn < -0.001 )
2947 m_flNextAmmoBurn = -0.001;
2948 }
2949
2950 if ( m_flAmmoStartCharge != 1000 )
2951 {
2952 m_flAmmoStartCharge -= gpGlobals->frametime;
2953
2954 if ( m_flAmmoStartCharge < -0.001 )
2955 m_flAmmoStartCharge = -0.001;
2956 }
2957#endif
2958
2959 // Track button info so we can detect 'pressed' and 'released' buttons next frame
2960 m_afButtonLast = pev->button;
2961}
2962
2974BOOL IsSpawnPointValid( CBaseEntity *pPlayer, CBaseEntity *pSpot )
2975{
2976 CBaseEntity *ent = NULL;
2977
2978 if ( !pSpot->IsTriggered( pPlayer ) )
2979 {
2980 return FALSE;
2981 }
2982
2983 while ( (ent = UTIL_FindEntityInSphere( ent, pSpot->pev->origin, 128 )) != NULL )
2984 {
2985 // if ent is a client, don't spawn on 'em
2986 if ( ent->IsPlayer() && ent != pPlayer )
2987 return FALSE;
2988 }
2989
2990 return TRUE;
2991}

2993
2994DLL_GLOBAL CBaseEntity *g_pLastSpawn;
2995inline int FNullEnt( CBaseEntity *ent ) { return (ent == NULL) || FNullEnt( ent->edict() ); }
2996
3009edict_t *EntSelectSpawnPoint( CBaseEntity *pPlayer )
3010{
3011 CBaseEntity *pSpot;
3012 edict_t *player;
3013
3014 player = pPlayer->edict();
3015
3016// choose a info_player_deathmatch point
3017 if (g_pGameRules->IsCoOp())
3018 {
3019 pSpot = UTIL_FindEntityByClassname( g_pLastSpawn, "info_player_coop");
3020 if ( !FNullEnt(pSpot) )
3021 goto ReturnSpot;
3022 pSpot = UTIL_FindEntityByClassname( g_pLastSpawn, "info_player_start");
3023 if ( !FNullEnt(pSpot) )
3024 goto ReturnSpot;
3025 }
3026 else if ( g_pGameRules->IsDeathmatch() )
3027 {
3028 pSpot = g_pLastSpawn;
3029 // Randomize the start spot
3030 for ( int i = RANDOM_LONG(1,5); i > 0; i-- )
3031 pSpot = UTIL_FindEntityByClassname( pSpot, "info_player_deathmatch" );
3032 if ( FNullEnt( pSpot ) ) // skip over the null point
3033 pSpot = UTIL_FindEntityByClassname( pSpot, "info_player_deathmatch" );
3034
3035 CBaseEntity *pFirstSpot = pSpot;
3036
3037 do
3038 {
3039 if ( pSpot )
3040 {
3041 // check if pSpot is valid
3042 if ( IsSpawnPointValid( pPlayer, pSpot ) )
3043 {
3044 if ( pSpot->pev->origin == Vector( 0, 0, 0 ) )
3045 {
3046 pSpot = UTIL_FindEntityByClassname( pSpot, "info_player_deathmatch" );
3047 continue;
3048 }
3049
3050 // if so, go to pSpot
3051 goto ReturnSpot;
3052 }
3053 }
3054 // increment pSpot
3055 pSpot = UTIL_FindEntityByClassname( pSpot, "info_player_deathmatch" );
3056 } while ( pSpot != pFirstSpot ); // loop if we're not back to the start
3057
3058 // we haven't found a place to spawn yet, so kill any guy at the first spawn point and spawn there
3059 if ( !FNullEnt( pSpot ) )
3060 {
3061 CBaseEntity *ent = NULL;
3062 while ( (ent = UTIL_FindEntityInSphere( ent, pSpot->pev->origin, 128 )) != NULL )
3063 {
3064 // if ent is a client, kill em (unless they are ourselves)
3065 if ( ent->IsPlayer() && !(ent->edict() == player) )
3066 ent->TakeDamage( VARS(INDEXENT(0)), VARS(INDEXENT(0)), 300, DMG_GENERIC );
3067 }
3068 goto ReturnSpot;
3069 }
3070 }
3071
3072 // If startspot is set, (re)spawn there.
3073 if ( FStringNull( gpGlobals->startspot ) || !strlen(STRING(gpGlobals->startspot)))
3074 {
3075 pSpot = UTIL_FindEntityByClassname(NULL, "info_player_start");
3076 if ( !FNullEnt(pSpot) )
3077 goto ReturnSpot;
3078 }
3079 else
3080 {
3081 pSpot = UTIL_FindEntityByTargetname( NULL, STRING(gpGlobals->startspot) );
3082 if ( !FNullEnt(pSpot) )
3083 goto ReturnSpot;
3084 }
3085
3086ReturnSpot:
3087 if ( FNullEnt( pSpot ) )
3088 {
3089 ALERT(at_error, "PutClientInServer: no info_player_start on level");
3090 return INDEXENT(0);
3091 }
3092
3093 g_pLastSpawn = pSpot;
3094 return pSpot->edict();
3095}

3224 // because they need to precache before any clients have connected
3225

3227 // we cross a level transition
3228

3286int CBasePlayer::Restore( CRestore &restore )
3287{
3288 if ( !CBaseMonster::Restore(restore) )
3289 return 0;
3290
3291 int status = restore.ReadFields( "PLAYER", this, m_playerSaveData, ARRAYSIZE(m_playerSaveData) );
3292
3293 SAVERESTOREDATA *pSaveData = (SAVERESTOREDATA *)gpGlobals->pSaveData;
3294 // landmark isn't present.
3295 if ( !pSaveData->fUseLandmark )
3296 {
3297 ALERT( at_console, "No Landmark:%s\n", pSaveData->szLandmarkName );
3298
3299 // default to normal spawn
3300 edict_t* pentSpawnSpot = EntSelectSpawnPoint( this );
3301 pev->origin = VARS(pentSpawnSpot)->origin + Vector(0,0,1);
3302 pev->angles = VARS(pentSpawnSpot)->angles;
3303 }
3304 pev->v_angle.z = 0; // Clear out roll
3305 pev->angles = pev->v_angle;
3306
3307 pev->fixangle = TRUE; // turn this way immediately
3308
3309// Copied from spawn() for now
3310 m_bloodColor = BLOOD_COLOR_RED;
3311
3312 g_ulModelIndexPlayer = pev->modelindex;
3313
3314 if ( FBitSet(pev->flags, FL_DUCKING) )
3315 {
3316 // Use the crouch HACK
3317 //FixPlayerCrouchStuck( edict() );
3318 // Don't need to do this with new player prediction code.
3319 UTIL_SetSize(pev, VEC_DUCK_HULL_MIN, VEC_DUCK_HULL_MAX);
3320 }
3321 else
3322 {
3323 UTIL_SetSize(pev, VEC_HULL_MIN, VEC_HULL_MAX);
3324 }
3325
3326 g_engfuncs.pfnSetPhysicsKeyValue( edict(), "hl", "1" );
3327
3328 if ( m_fLongJump )
3329 {
3330 g_engfuncs.pfnSetPhysicsKeyValue( edict(), "slj", "1" );
3331 }
3332 else
3333 {
3334 g_engfuncs.pfnSetPhysicsKeyValue( edict(), "slj", "0" );
3335 }
3336
3337 RenewItems();
3338
3339#if defined( CLIENT_WEAPONS )
3340 // HACK: This variable is saved/restored in CBaseMonster as a time variable, but we're using it
3341 // as just a counter. Ideally, this needs its own variable that's saved as a plain float.
3342 // Barring that, we clear it out here instead of using the incorrect restored time value.
3343 m_flNextAttack = UTIL_WeaponTimeBase();
3344#endif
3345
3346 return status;
3347}

3358void CBasePlayer::SelectNextItem( int iItem )
3359{
3360 CBasePlayerItem *pItem;
3361
3362 pItem = m_rgpPlayerItems[ iItem ];
3363
3364 if (!pItem)
3365 return;
3366
3367 if (pItem == m_pActiveItem)
3368 {
3369 // select the next one in the chain
3370 pItem = m_pActiveItem->m_pNext;
3371 if (! pItem)
3372 {
3373 return;
3374 }
3375
3376 CBasePlayerItem *pLast;
3377 pLast = pItem;
3378 while (pLast->m_pNext)
3379 pLast = pLast->m_pNext;
3380
3381 // relink chain
3382 pLast->m_pNext = m_pActiveItem;
3383 m_pActiveItem->m_pNext = NULL;
3384 m_rgpPlayerItems[ iItem ] = pItem;
3385 }
3386
3387 ResetAutoaim( );
3388
3389 // FIX, this needs to queue them up and delay
3390 if (m_pActiveItem)
3391 {
3392 m_pActiveItem->Holster( );
3393 }
3394
3395 m_pActiveItem = pItem;
3396
3397 if (m_pActiveItem)
3398 {
3399 m_pActiveItem->Deploy( );
3400 m_pActiveItem->UpdateItemInfo( );
3401 }
3402}
3403
3412void CBasePlayer::SelectItem(const char *pstr)
3413{
3414 if (!pstr)
3415 return;
3416
3417 CBasePlayerItem *pItem = NULL;
3418
3419 for (int i = 0; i < MAX_ITEM_TYPES; i++)
3420 {
3421 if (m_rgpPlayerItems[i])
3422 {
3423 pItem = m_rgpPlayerItems[i];
3424
3425 while (pItem)
3426 {
3427 if (FClassnameIs(pItem->pev, pstr))
3428 break;
3429 pItem = pItem->m_pNext;
3430 }
3431 }
3432
3433 if (pItem)
3434 break;
3435 }
3436
3437 if (!pItem)
3438 return;
3439
3440
3441 if (pItem == m_pActiveItem)
3442 return;
3443
3444 ResetAutoaim( );
3445
3446 // FIX, this needs to queue them up and delay
3447 if (m_pActiveItem)
3448 m_pActiveItem->Holster( );
3449
3450 m_pLastItem = m_pActiveItem;
3451 m_pActiveItem = pItem;
3452
3453 if (m_pActiveItem)
3454 {
3455 m_pActiveItem->Deploy( );
3456 m_pActiveItem->UpdateItemInfo( );
3457 }
3458}

3466void CBasePlayer::SelectLastItem(void)

3468 if (!m_pLastItem)
3469 {
3470 return;
3471 }
3472
3473 if ( m_pActiveItem && !m_pActiveItem->CanHolster() )
3474 {
3475 return;
3476 }
3477
3478 ResetAutoaim( );
3479
3480 // FIX, this needs to queue them up and delay
3481 if (m_pActiveItem)
3482 m_pActiveItem->Holster( );
3483
3484 CBasePlayerItem *pTemp = m_pActiveItem;
3485 m_pActiveItem = m_pLastItem;
3486 m_pLastItem = pTemp;
3487 m_pActiveItem->Deploy( );
3488 m_pActiveItem->UpdateItemInfo( );
3489}

3585void CSprayCan::Think( void )
3586{
3587 TraceResult tr;
3588 int playernum;
3589 int nFrames;
3590 CBasePlayer *pPlayer;
3591
3592 pPlayer = (CBasePlayer *)GET_PRIVATE(pev->owner);
3593
3594 if (pPlayer)
3595 nFrames = pPlayer->GetCustomDecalFrames();
3596 else
3597 nFrames = -1;
3598
3599 playernum = ENTINDEX(pev->owner);
3600
3601 // ALERT(at_console, "Spray by player %i, %i of %i\n", playernum, (int)(pev->frame + 1), nFrames);
3602
3603 UTIL_MakeVectors(pev->angles);
3604 UTIL_TraceLine ( pev->origin, pev->origin + gpGlobals->v_forward * 128, ignore_monsters, pev->owner, & tr);
3605
3606 // No customization present.
3607 if (nFrames == -1)
3608 {
3609 UTIL_DecalTrace( &tr, DECAL_LAMBDA6 );
3610 UTIL_Remove( this );
3611 }
3612 else
3613 {
3614 UTIL_PlayerDecalTrace( &tr, playernum, pev->frame, TRUE );
3615 // Just painted last custom frame.
3616 if ( pev->frame++ >= (nFrames - 1))
3617 UTIL_Remove( this );
3618 }
3619
3620 pev->nextthink = gpGlobals->time + 0.1;
3621}

3748void CBasePlayer :: FlashlightTurnOn( void )
3749{
3750 if ( !g_pGameRules->FAllowFlashlight() )
3751 {
3752 return;
3753 }
3754
3755 if ( (pev->weapons & (1<<WEAPON_SUIT)) )
3756 {
3757 EMIT_SOUND_DYN( ENT(pev), CHAN_WEAPON, SOUND_FLASHLIGHT_ON, 1.0, ATTN_NORM, 0, PITCH_NORM );
3758 SetBits(pev->effects, EF_DIMLIGHT);
3759 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgFlashlight, NULL, pev );
3760 WRITE_BYTE(1);
3761 WRITE_BYTE(m_iFlashBattery);
3762 MESSAGE_END();
3763
3764 m_flFlashLightTime = FLASH_DRAIN_TIME + gpGlobals->time;
3765
3766 }

3776void CBasePlayer :: FlashlightTurnOff( void )
3777{
3778 EMIT_SOUND_DYN( ENT(pev), CHAN_WEAPON, SOUND_FLASHLIGHT_OFF, 1.0, ATTN_NORM, 0, PITCH_NORM );
3779 ClearBits(pev->effects, EF_DIMLIGHT);
3780 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgFlashlight, NULL, pev );
3781 WRITE_BYTE(0);
3782 WRITE_BYTE(m_iFlashBattery);
3783 MESSAGE_END();
3784
3785 m_flFlashLightTime = FLASH_CHARGE_TIME + gpGlobals->time;

3811ImpulseCommands
3812============
