3814extern float g_flWeaponCheat;
3815
3822void CBasePlayer::ImpulseCommands( )
3823{
3824 TraceResult tr;// UNDONE: kill me! This is temporary for PreAlpha CDs
3825
3826 // Handle use events
3827 PlayerUse();
3828
3829 int iImpulse = (int)pev->impulse;
3830 switch (iImpulse)
3831 {
3832 case 99:
3833 {
3834
3835 int iOn;
3836
3837 if (!gmsgLogo)
3838 {
3839 iOn = 1;
3840 gmsgLogo = REG_USER_MSG("Logo", 1);
3841 }
3842 else
3843 {
3844 iOn = 0;
3845 }
3846
3847 ASSERT( gmsgLogo > 0 );
3848 // send "health" update message
3849 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgLogo, NULL, pev );
3850 WRITE_BYTE(iOn);
3851 MESSAGE_END();
3852
3853 if(!iOn)
3854 gmsgLogo = 0;
3855 break;
3856 }
3857 case 100:
3858 // temporary flashlight for level designers
3859 if ( FlashlightIsOn() )
3860 {
3861 FlashlightTurnOff();
3862 }
3863 else
3864 {
3865 FlashlightTurnOn();
3866 }
3867 break;
3868
3869 case 201:// paint decal
3870
3871 if ( gpGlobals->time < m_flNextDecalTime )
3872 {
3873 // too early!
3874 break;
3875 }
3876
3877 UTIL_MakeVectors(pev->v_angle);
3878 UTIL_TraceLine ( pev->origin + pev->view_ofs, pev->origin + pev->view_ofs + gpGlobals->v_forward * 128, ignore_monsters, ENT(pev), & tr);
3879
3880 if ( tr.flFraction != 1.0 )
3881 {// line hit something, so paint a decal
3882 m_flNextDecalTime = gpGlobals->time + decalfrequency.value;
3883 CSprayCan *pCan = GetClassPtr((CSprayCan *)NULL);
3884 pCan->Spawn( pev );
3885 }
3886
3887 break;
3888
3889 default:
3890 // check all of the cheat impulse commands now
3891 CheatImpulseCommands( iImpulse );
3892 break;
3893 }
3894
3895 pev->impulse = 0;
3896}
3897
3907void CBasePlayer::CheatImpulseCommands( int iImpulse )
3908{
3909#if !defined( HLDEMO_BUILD )
3910 if ( g_flWeaponCheat == 0.0 )
3911 {
3912 return;
3913 }
3914
3915 CBaseEntity *pEntity;
3916 TraceResult tr;
3917
3918 switch ( iImpulse )
3919 {
3920 case 76:
3921 {
3922 if (!giPrecacheGrunt)
3923 {
3924 giPrecacheGrunt = 1;
3925 ALERT(at_console, "You must now restart to use Grunt-o-matic.\n");
3926 }
3927 else
3928 {
3929 UTIL_MakeVectors( Vector( 0, pev->v_angle.y, 0 ) );
3930 Create("monster_human_grunt", pev->origin + gpGlobals->v_forward * 128, pev->angles);
3931 }
3932 break;
3933 }
3934
3935
3936 case 101:
3937 gEvilImpulse101 = TRUE;
3938 GiveNamedItem( "item_suit" );
3939 GiveNamedItem( "item_battery" );
3940 GiveNamedItem( "weapon_crowbar" );
3941 GiveNamedItem( "weapon_9mmhandgun" );
3942 GiveNamedItem( "ammo_9mmclip" );
3943 GiveNamedItem( "weapon_shotgun" );
3944 GiveNamedItem( "ammo_buckshot" );
3945 GiveNamedItem( "weapon_9mmAR" );
3946 GiveNamedItem( "ammo_9mmAR" );
3947 GiveNamedItem( "ammo_ARgrenades" );
3948 GiveNamedItem( "weapon_handgrenade" );
3949 GiveNamedItem( "weapon_tripmine" );
3950#ifndef OEM_BUILD
3951 GiveNamedItem( "weapon_357" );
3952 GiveNamedItem( "ammo_357" );
3953 GiveNamedItem( "weapon_crossbow" );
3954 GiveNamedItem( "ammo_crossbow" );
3955 GiveNamedItem( "weapon_egon" );
3956 GiveNamedItem( "weapon_gauss" );
3957 GiveNamedItem( "ammo_gaussclip" );
3958 GiveNamedItem( "weapon_rpg" );
3959 GiveNamedItem( "ammo_rpgclip" );
3960 GiveNamedItem( "weapon_satchel" );
3961 GiveNamedItem( "weapon_snark" );
3962 GiveNamedItem( "weapon_hornetgun" );
3963#endif
3964 gEvilImpulse101 = FALSE;
3965 break;
3966
3967 case 102:
3968 // Gibbage!!!
3969 CGib::SpawnRandomGibs( pev, 1, 1 );
3970 break;
3971
3972 case 103:
3973 // What the hell are you doing?
3974 pEntity = FindEntityForward( this );
3975 if ( pEntity )
3976 {
3977 CBaseMonster *pMonster = pEntity->MyMonsterPointer();
3978 if ( pMonster )
3979 pMonster->ReportAIState();
3980 }
3981 break;
3982
3983 case 104:
3984 // Dump all of the global state varaibles (and global entity names)
3985 gGlobalState.DumpGlobals();
3986 break;
3987
3988 case 105:// player makes no sound for monsters to hear.
3989 {
3990 if ( m_fNoPlayerSound )
3991 {
3992 ALERT ( at_console, "Player is audible\n" );
3993 m_fNoPlayerSound = FALSE;
3994 }
3995 else
3996 {
3997 ALERT ( at_console, "Player is silent\n" );
3998 m_fNoPlayerSound = TRUE;
3999 }
4000 break;
4001 }
4002
4003 case 106:
4004 // Give me the classname and targetname of this entity.
4005 pEntity = FindEntityForward( this );
4006 if ( pEntity )
4007 {
4008 ALERT ( at_console, "Classname: %s", STRING( pEntity->pev->classname ) );
4009
4010 if ( !FStringNull ( pEntity->pev->targetname ) )
4011 {
4012 ALERT ( at_console, " - Targetname: %s\n", STRING( pEntity->pev->targetname ) );
4013 }
4014 else
4015 {
4016 ALERT ( at_console, " - TargetName: No Targetname\n" );
4017 }
4018
4019 ALERT ( at_console, "Model: %s\n", STRING( pEntity->pev->model ) );
4020 if ( pEntity->pev->globalname )
4021 ALERT ( at_console, "Globalname: %s\n", STRING( pEntity->pev->globalname ) );
4022 }
4023 break;
4024
4025 case 107:
4026 {
4027 TraceResult tr;
4028
4029 edict_t *pWorld = g_engfuncs.pfnPEntityOfEntIndex( 0 );
4030
4031 Vector start = pev->origin + pev->view_ofs;
4032 Vector end = start + gpGlobals->v_forward * 1024;
4033 UTIL_TraceLine( start, end, ignore_monsters, edict(), &tr );
4034 if ( tr.pHit )
4035 pWorld = tr.pHit;
4036 const char *pTextureName = TRACE_TEXTURE( pWorld, start, end );
4037 if ( pTextureName )
4038 ALERT( at_console, "Texture: %s\n", pTextureName );
4039 }
4040 break;
4041 case 195:// show shortest paths for entire level to nearest node
4042 {
4043 Create("node_viewer_fly", pev->origin, pev->angles);
4044 }
4045 break;
4046 case 196:// show shortest paths for entire level to nearest node
4047 {
4048 Create("node_viewer_large", pev->origin, pev->angles);
4049 }
4050 break;
4051 case 197:// show shortest paths for entire level to nearest node
4052 {
4053 Create("node_viewer_human", pev->origin, pev->angles);
4054 }
4055 break;
4056 case 199:// show nearest node and all connections
4057 {
4058 ALERT ( at_console, "%d\n", WorldGraph.FindNearestNode ( pev->origin, bits_NODE_GROUP_REALM ) );
4059 WorldGraph.ShowNodeConnections ( WorldGraph.FindNearestNode ( pev->origin, bits_NODE_GROUP_REALM ) );
4060 }
4061 break;
4062 case 202:// Random blood splatter
4063 UTIL_MakeVectors(pev->v_angle);
4064 UTIL_TraceLine ( pev->origin + pev->view_ofs, pev->origin + pev->view_ofs + gpGlobals->v_forward * 128, ignore_monsters, ENT(pev), & tr);
4065
4066 if ( tr.flFraction != 1.0 )
4067 {// line hit something, so paint a decal
4068 CBloodSplat *pBlood = GetClassPtr((CBloodSplat *)NULL);
4069 pBlood->Spawn( pev );
4070 }
4071 break;
4072 case 203:// remove creature.
4073 pEntity = FindEntityForward( this );
4074 if ( pEntity )
4075 {
4076 if ( pEntity->pev->takedamage )
4077 pEntity->SetThink(&CBaseEntity::SUB_Remove);
4078 }
4079 break;
4080 }
4081#endif // HLDEMO_BUILD
4082}
4083
4093int CBasePlayer::AddPlayerItem( CBasePlayerItem *pItem )
4094{
4095 CBasePlayerItem *pInsert;
4096
4097 pInsert = m_rgpPlayerItems[pItem->iItemSlot()];
4098
4099 while (pInsert)
4100 {
4101 if (FClassnameIs( pInsert->pev, STRING( pItem->pev->classname) ))
4102 {
4103 if (pItem->AddDuplicate( pInsert ))
4104 {
4105 g_pGameRules->PlayerGotWeapon ( this, pItem );
4106 pItem->CheckRespawn();
4107
4108 // ugly hack to update clip w/o an update clip message
4109 pInsert->UpdateItemInfo( );
4110 if (m_pActiveItem)
4111 m_pActiveItem->UpdateItemInfo( );
4112
4113 pItem->Kill( );
4114 }
4115 else if (gEvilImpulse101)
4116 {
4117 // FIXME: remove anyway for deathmatch testing
4118 pItem->Kill( );
4119 }
4120 return FALSE;
4121 }
4122 pInsert = pInsert->m_pNext;
4123 }
4124
4125
4126 if (pItem->AddToPlayer( this ))
4127 {
4128 g_pGameRules->PlayerGotWeapon ( this, pItem );
4129 pItem->CheckRespawn();
4130
4131 pItem->m_pNext = m_rgpPlayerItems[pItem->iItemSlot()];
4132 m_rgpPlayerItems[pItem->iItemSlot()] = pItem;
4133
4134 // should we switch to this item?
4135 if ( g_pGameRules->FShouldSwitchWeapon( this, pItem ) )
4136 {
4137 SwitchWeapon( pItem );
4138 }
4139
4140 return TRUE;
4141 }
4142 else if (gEvilImpulse101)
4143 {
4144 // FIXME: remove anyway for deathmatch testing
4145 pItem->Kill( );
4146 }
4147 return FALSE;
4148}
4149
4159int CBasePlayer::RemovePlayerItem( CBasePlayerItem *pItem )
4160{
4161 if (m_pActiveItem == pItem)
4162 {
4163 ResetAutoaim( );
4164 pItem->Holster( );
4165 pItem->pev->nextthink = 0;// crowbar may be trying to swing again, etc.
4166 pItem->SetThink( NULL );
4167 m_pActiveItem = NULL;
4168 pev->viewmodel = 0;
4169 pev->weaponmodel = 0;
4170 }
4171 else if ( m_pLastItem == pItem )
4172 m_pLastItem = NULL;
4173
4174 CBasePlayerItem *pPrev = m_rgpPlayerItems[pItem->iItemSlot()];
4175
4176 if (pPrev == pItem)
4177 {
4178 m_rgpPlayerItems[pItem->iItemSlot()] = pItem->m_pNext;
4179 return TRUE;
4180 }
4181 else
4182 {
4183 while (pPrev && pPrev->m_pNext != pItem)
4184 {
4185 pPrev = pPrev->m_pNext;
4186 }
4187 if (pPrev)
4188 {
4189 pPrev->m_pNext = pItem->m_pNext;
4190 return TRUE;
4191 }
4192 }
4193 return FALSE;
4194}
4195
4207int CBasePlayer :: GiveAmmo( int iCount, char *szName, int iMax )
4208{
4209 if ( !szName )
4210 {
4211 // no ammo.
4212 return -1;
4213 }
4214
4215 if ( !g_pGameRules->CanHaveAmmo( this, szName, iMax ) )
4216 {
4217 // game rules say I can't have any more of this ammo type.
4218 return -1;
4219 }
4220
4221 int i = 0;
4222
4223 i = GetAmmoIndex( szName );
4224
4225 if ( i < 0 || i >= MAX_AMMO_SLOTS )
4226 return -1;
4227
4228 int iAdd = min( iCount, iMax - m_rgAmmo[i] );
4229 if ( iAdd < 1 )
4230 return i;
4231
4232 m_rgAmmo[ i ] += iAdd;
4233
4234
4235 if ( gmsgAmmoPickup ) // make sure the ammo messages have been linked first
4236 {
4237 // Send the message that ammo has been picked up
4238 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgAmmoPickup, NULL, pev );
4239 WRITE_BYTE( GetAmmoIndex(szName) ); // ammo ID
4240 WRITE_BYTE( iAdd ); // amount
4241 MESSAGE_END();
4242 }
4243
4244 TabulateAmmo();
4245
4246 return i;
4247}

4299 if (!m_pActiveItem)

4320
4330int CBasePlayer::GetAmmoIndex(const char *psz)
4331{
4332 int i;
4333
4334 if (!psz)
4335 return -1;
4336
4337 for (i = 1; i < MAX_AMMO_SLOTS; i++)
4338 {
4339 if ( !CBasePlayerItem::AmmoInfoArray[i].pszName )
4340 continue;
4341
4342 if (stricmp( psz, CBasePlayerItem::AmmoInfoArray[i].pszName ) == 0)
4343 return i;
4344 }
4345
4346 return -1;
4347}
4348
4355void CBasePlayer::SendAmmoUpdate(void)
4356{
4357 for (int i=0; i < MAX_AMMO_SLOTS;i++)
4358 {
4359 if (m_rgAmmo[i] != m_rgAmmoLast[i])
4360 {
4361 m_rgAmmoLast[i] = m_rgAmmo[i];
4362
4363 ASSERT( m_rgAmmo[i] >= 0 );
4364 ASSERT( m_rgAmmo[i] < 255 );
4365
4366 // send "Ammo" update message
4367 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgAmmoX, NULL, pev );
4368 WRITE_BYTE( i );
4369 WRITE_BYTE( max( min( m_rgAmmo[i], 254 ), 0 ) ); // clamp the value to one byte
4370 MESSAGE_END();
4371 }
4372 }
4373}

4381void CBasePlayer :: UpdateClientData( void )
4382{
4383 if (m_fInitHUD)
4384 {
4385 m_fInitHUD = FALSE;
4386 gInitHUD = FALSE;
4387
4388 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgResetHUD, NULL, pev );
4389 WRITE_BYTE( 0 );
4390 MESSAGE_END();
4391
4392 if ( !m_fGameHUDInitialized )
4393 {
4394 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgInitHUD, NULL, pev );
4395 MESSAGE_END();
4396
4397 g_pGameRules->InitHUD( this );
4398 m_fGameHUDInitialized = TRUE;
4399
4400 m_iObserverLastMode = OBS_ROAMING;
4401
4402 if ( g_pGameRules->IsMultiplayer() )
4403 {
4404 FireTargets( "game_playerjoin", this, this, USE_TOGGLE, 0 );
4405 }
4406 }
4407
4408 FireTargets( "game_playerspawn", this, this, USE_TOGGLE, 0 );
4409
4410 InitStatusBar();
4411 }
4412
4413 if ( m_iHideHUD != m_iClientHideHUD )
4414 {
4415 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgHideWeapon, NULL, pev );
4416 WRITE_BYTE( m_iHideHUD );
4417 MESSAGE_END();
4418
4419 m_iClientHideHUD = m_iHideHUD;
4420 }
4421
4422 if ( m_iFOV != m_iClientFOV )
4423 {
4424 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgSetFOV, NULL, pev );
4425 WRITE_BYTE( m_iFOV );
4426 MESSAGE_END();
4427
4428 // cache FOV change at end of function, so weapon updates can see that FOV has changed
4429 }
4430
4431 // HACKHACK -- send the message to display the game title
4432 if (gDisplayTitle)
4433 {
4434 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgShowGameTitle, NULL, pev );
4435 WRITE_BYTE( 0 );
4436 MESSAGE_END();
4437 gDisplayTitle = 0;
4438 }
4439
4440 if (pev->health != m_iClientHealth)
4441 {
4442#define clamp( val, min, max ) ( ((val) > (max)) ? (max) : ( ((val) < (min)) ? (min) : (val) ) )
4443 int iHealth = clamp( pev->health, 0, 255 ); // make sure that no negative health values are sent
4444 if ( pev->health > 0.0f && pev->health <= 1.0f )
4445 iHealth = 1;
4446
4447 // send "health" update message
4448 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgHealth, NULL, pev );
4449 WRITE_BYTE( iHealth );
4450 MESSAGE_END();
4451
4452 m_iClientHealth = pev->health;
4453 }
4454
4455
4456 if (pev->armorvalue != m_iClientBattery)
4457 {
4458 m_iClientBattery = pev->armorvalue;
4459
4460 ASSERT( gmsgBattery > 0 );
4461 // send "health" update message
4462 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgBattery, NULL, pev );
4463 WRITE_SHORT( (int)pev->armorvalue);
4464 MESSAGE_END();
4465 }
4466
4467 if (pev->dmg_take || pev->dmg_save || m_bitsHUDDamage != m_bitsDamageType)
4468 {
4469 // Comes from inside me if not set
4470 Vector damageOrigin = pev->origin;
4471 // send "damage" message
4472 // causes screen to flash, and pain compass to show direction of damage
4473 edict_t *other = pev->dmg_inflictor;
4474 if ( other )
4475 {
4476 CBaseEntity *pEntity = CBaseEntity::Instance(other);
4477 if ( pEntity )
4478 damageOrigin = pEntity->Center();
4479 }
4480
4481 // only send down damage type that have hud art
4482 int visibleDamageBits = m_bitsDamageType & DMG_SHOWNHUD;
4483
4484 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgDamage, NULL, pev );
4485 WRITE_BYTE( pev->dmg_save );
4486 WRITE_BYTE( pev->dmg_take );
4487 WRITE_LONG( visibleDamageBits );
4488 WRITE_COORD( damageOrigin.x );
4489 WRITE_COORD( damageOrigin.y );
4490 WRITE_COORD( damageOrigin.z );
4491 MESSAGE_END();
4492
4493 pev->dmg_take = 0;
4494 pev->dmg_save = 0;
4495 m_bitsHUDDamage = m_bitsDamageType;
4496
4497 // Clear off non-time-based damage indicators
4498 m_bitsDamageType &= DMG_TIMEBASED;
4499 }
4500
4501 // Update Flashlight
4502 if ((m_flFlashLightTime) && (m_flFlashLightTime <= gpGlobals->time))
4503 {
4504 if (FlashlightIsOn())
4505 {
4506 if (m_iFlashBattery)
4507 {
4508 m_flFlashLightTime = FLASH_DRAIN_TIME + gpGlobals->time;
4509 m_iFlashBattery--;
4510
4511 if (!m_iFlashBattery)
4512 FlashlightTurnOff();
4513 }
4514 }
4515 else
4516 {
4517 if (m_iFlashBattery < 100)
4518 {
4519 m_flFlashLightTime = FLASH_CHARGE_TIME + gpGlobals->time;
4520 m_iFlashBattery++;
4521 }
4522 else
4523 m_flFlashLightTime = 0;
4524 }
4525
4526 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgFlashBattery, NULL, pev );
4527 WRITE_BYTE(m_iFlashBattery);
4528 MESSAGE_END();
4529 }
4530
4531
4532 if (m_iTrain & TRAIN_NEW)
4533 {
4534 ASSERT( gmsgTrain > 0 );
4535 // send "health" update message
4536 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgTrain, NULL, pev );
4537 WRITE_BYTE(m_iTrain & 0xF);
4538 MESSAGE_END();
4539
4540 m_iTrain &= ~TRAIN_NEW;
4541 }
4542
4543 //
4544 // New Weapon?
4545 //
4546 if (!m_fKnownItem)
4547 {
4548 m_fKnownItem = TRUE;
4549
4550 // WeaponInit Message
4551 // byte = # of weapons
4552 //
4553 // for each weapon:
4554 // byte name str length (not including null)
4555 // bytes... name
4556 // byte Ammo Type
4557 // byte Ammo2 Type
4558 // byte bucket
4559 // byte bucket pos
4560 // byte flags
4561 // ???? Icons
4562
4563 // Send ALL the weapon info now
4564 int i;
4565
4566 for (i = 0; i < MAX_WEAPONS; i++)
4567 {
4568 ItemInfo& II = CBasePlayerItem::ItemInfoArray[i];
4569
4570 if ( !II.iId )
4571 continue;
4572
4573 const char *pszName;
4574 if (!II.pszName)
4575 pszName = "Empty";
4576 else
4577 pszName = II.pszName;
4578
4579 MESSAGE_BEGIN( MSG_ONE, gmsgWeaponList, NULL, pev );
4580 WRITE_STRING(pszName); // string weapon name
4581 WRITE_BYTE(GetAmmoIndex(II.pszAmmo1)); // byte Ammo Type
4582 WRITE_BYTE(II.iMaxAmmo1); // byte Max Ammo 1
4583 WRITE_BYTE(GetAmmoIndex(II.pszAmmo2)); // byte Ammo2 Type
4584 WRITE_BYTE(II.iMaxAmmo2); // byte Max Ammo 2
4585 WRITE_BYTE(II.iSlot); // byte bucket
4586 WRITE_BYTE(II.iPosition); // byte bucket pos
4587 WRITE_BYTE(II.iId); // byte id (bit index into pev->weapons)
4588 WRITE_BYTE(II.iFlags); // byte Flags
4589 MESSAGE_END();
4590 }
4591 }
4592
4593
4594 SendAmmoUpdate();
4595
4596 // Update all the items
4597 for ( int i = 0; i < MAX_ITEM_TYPES; i++ )
4598 {
4599 if ( m_rgpPlayerItems[i] ) // each item updates it's successors
4600 m_rgpPlayerItems[i]->UpdateClientData( this );
4601 }
4602
4603 // Cache and client weapon change
4604 m_pClientActiveItem = m_pActiveItem;
4605 m_iClientFOV = m_iFOV;
4606
4607 // Update Status Bar
4608 if ( m_flNextSBarUpdateTime < gpGlobals->time )
4609 {
4610 UpdateStatusBar();
4611 m_flNextSBarUpdateTime = gpGlobals->time + 0.2;
4612 }
4613}

4652
4661int CBasePlayer :: Illumination( void )
4662{
4663 int iIllum = CBaseEntity::Illumination( );
4664
4665 iIllum += m_iWeaponFlash;
4666 if (iIllum > 255)
4667 return 255;
4668 return iIllum;

4713Vector CBasePlayer :: GetAutoaimVector( float flDelta )
4714{
4715 if (g_iSkillLevel == SKILL_HARD)
4716 {
4717 UTIL_MakeVectors( pev->v_angle + pev->punchangle );
4718 return gpGlobals->v_forward;
4719 }
4720
4721 Vector vecSrc = GetGunPosition( );
4722 float flDist = 8192;
4723
4724 // always use non-sticky autoaim
4725 // UNDONE: use sever variable to chose!
4726 if (1 || g_iSkillLevel == SKILL_MEDIUM)
4727 {
4728 m_vecAutoAim = Vector( 0, 0, 0 );
4729 // flDelta *= 0.5;
4730 }
4731
4732 BOOL m_fOldTargeting = m_fOnTarget;
4733 Vector angles = AutoaimDeflection(vecSrc, flDist, flDelta );
4734
4735 // update ontarget if changed
4736 if ( !g_pGameRules->AllowAutoTargetCrosshair() )
4737 m_fOnTarget = 0;
4738 else if (m_fOldTargeting != m_fOnTarget)
4739 {
4740 m_pActiveItem->UpdateItemInfo( );
4741 }
4742
4743 if (angles.x > 180)
4744 angles.x -= 360;
4745 if (angles.x < -180)
4746 angles.x += 360;
4747 if (angles.y > 180)
4748 angles.y -= 360;
4749 if (angles.y < -180)
4750 angles.y += 360;
4751
4752 if (angles.x > 25)
4753 angles.x = 25;
4754 if (angles.x < -25)
4755 angles.x = -25;
4756 if (angles.y > 12)
4757 angles.y = 12;
4758 if (angles.y < -12)
4759 angles.y = -12;
4760
4761
4762 // always use non-sticky autoaim
4763 // UNDONE: use sever variable to chose!
4764 if (0 || g_iSkillLevel == SKILL_EASY)
4765 {
4766 m_vecAutoAim = m_vecAutoAim * 0.67 + angles * 0.33;
4767 }
4768 else
4769 {
4770 m_vecAutoAim = angles * 0.9;
4771 }
4772
4773 // m_vecAutoAim = m_vecAutoAim * 0.99;
4774
4775 // Don't send across network if sv_aim is 0
4776 if ( g_psv_aim->value != 0 )
4777 {
4778 if ( m_vecAutoAim.x != m_lastx ||
4779 m_vecAutoAim.y != m_lasty )
4780 {
4781 SET_CROSSHAIRANGLE( edict(), -m_vecAutoAim.x, m_vecAutoAim.y );
4782
4783 m_lastx = m_vecAutoAim.x;
4784 m_lasty = m_vecAutoAim.y;
4785 }
4786 }
4787
4788 // ALERT( at_console, "%f %f\n", angles.x, angles.y );
4789
4790 UTIL_MakeVectors( pev->v_angle + pev->punchangle + m_vecAutoAim );
4791 return gpGlobals->v_forward;
4792}
4793
4805Vector CBasePlayer :: AutoaimDeflection( Vector &vecSrc, float flDist, float flDelta )
4806{
4807 edict_t *pEdict = g_engfuncs.pfnPEntityOfEntIndex( 1 );
4808 CBaseEntity *pEntity;
4809 float bestdot;
4810 Vector bestdir;
4811 edict_t *bestent;
4812 TraceResult tr;
4813
4814 if ( g_psv_aim->value == 0 )
4815 {
4816 m_fOnTarget = FALSE;
4817 return g_vecZero;
4818 }
4819
4820 UTIL_MakeVectors( pev->v_angle + pev->punchangle + m_vecAutoAim );
4821
4822 // try all possible entities
4823 bestdir = gpGlobals->v_forward;
4824 bestdot = flDelta; // +- 10 degrees
4825 bestent = NULL;
4826
4827 m_fOnTarget = FALSE;
4828
4829 UTIL_TraceLine( vecSrc, vecSrc + bestdir * flDist, dont_ignore_monsters, edict(), &tr );
4830
4831
4832 if ( tr.pHit && tr.pHit->v.takedamage != DAMAGE_NO)
4833 {
4834 // don't look through water
4835 if (!((pev->waterlevel != 3 && tr.pHit->v.waterlevel == 3)
4836 || (pev->waterlevel == 3 && tr.pHit->v.waterlevel == 0)))
4837 {
4838 if (tr.pHit->v.takedamage == DAMAGE_AIM)
4839 m_fOnTarget = TRUE;
4840
4841 return m_vecAutoAim;
4842 }
4843 }
4844
4845 for ( int i = 1; i < gpGlobals->maxEntities; i++, pEdict++ )
4846 {
4847 Vector center;
4848 Vector dir;
4849 float dot;
4850
4851 if ( pEdict->free ) // Not in use
4852 continue;
4853
4854 if (pEdict->v.takedamage != DAMAGE_AIM)
4855 continue;
4856 if (pEdict == edict())
4857 continue;
4858// if (pev->team > 0 && pEdict->v.team == pev->team)
4859// continue; // don't aim at teammate
4860 if ( !g_pGameRules->ShouldAutoAim( this, pEdict ) )
4861 continue;
4862
4863 pEntity = Instance( pEdict );
4864 if (pEntity == NULL)
4865 continue;
4866
4867 if (!pEntity->IsAlive())
4868 continue;
4869
4870 // don't look through water
4871 if ((pev->waterlevel != 3 && pEntity->pev->waterlevel == 3)
4872 || (pev->waterlevel == 3 && pEntity->pev->waterlevel == 0))
4873 continue;
4874
4875 center = pEntity->BodyTarget( vecSrc );
4876
4877 dir = (center - vecSrc).Normalize( );
4878
4879 // make sure it's in front of the player
4880 if (DotProduct (dir, gpGlobals->v_forward ) < 0)
4881 continue;
4882
4883 dot = fabs( DotProduct (dir, gpGlobals->v_right ) )
4884 + fabs( DotProduct (dir, gpGlobals->v_up ) ) * 0.5;
4885
4886 // tweek for distance
4887 dot *= 1.0 + 0.2 * ((center - vecSrc).Length() / flDist);
4888
4889 if (dot > bestdot)
4890 continue; // to far to turn
4891
4892 UTIL_TraceLine( vecSrc, center, dont_ignore_monsters, edict(), &tr );
4893 if (tr.flFraction != 1.0 && tr.pHit != pEdict)
4894 {
4895 // ALERT( at_console, "hit %s, can't see %s\n", STRING( tr.pHit->v.classname ), STRING( pEdict->v.classname ) );
4896 continue;
4897 }
4898
4899 // don't shoot at friends
4900 if (IRelationship( pEntity ) < 0)
4901 {
4902 if ( !pEntity->IsPlayer() && !g_pGameRules->IsDeathmatch())
4903 // ALERT( at_console, "friend\n");
4904 continue;
4905 }
4906
4907 // can shoot at this one
4908 bestdot = dot;
4909 bestent = pEdict;
4910 bestdir = dir;
4911 }
4912
4913 if (bestent)
4914 {
4915 bestdir = UTIL_VecToAngles (bestdir);
4916 bestdir.x = -bestdir.x;
4917 bestdir = bestdir - pev->v_angle - pev->punchangle;
4918
4919 if (bestent->v.takedamage == DAMAGE_AIM)
4920 m_fOnTarget = TRUE;
4921
4922 return bestdir;
4923 }
4924
4925 return Vector( 0, 0, 0 );
4926}

4938 m_vecAutoAim = Vector( 0, 0, 0 );
4939 SET_CROSSHAIRANGLE( edict(), 0, 0 );
4940 }
4941 m_fOnTarget = FALSE;
4942}

4984void CBasePlayer::DropPlayerItem ( char *pszItemName )
4985{
4986 if ( !g_pGameRules->IsMultiplayer() || (weaponstay.value > 0) )
4987 {
4988 // no dropping in single player.
4989 return;
4990 }
4991
4992 if ( !strlen( pszItemName ) )
4993 {
4994 // if this string has no length, the client didn't type a name!
4995 // assume player wants to drop the active item.
4996 // make the string null to make future operations in this function easier
4997 pszItemName = NULL;
4998 }
4999
5000 CBasePlayerItem *pWeapon;
5001 int i;
5002
5003 for ( i = 0 ; i < MAX_ITEM_TYPES ; i++ )
5004 {
5005 pWeapon = m_rgpPlayerItems[ i ];
5006
5007 while ( pWeapon )
5008 {
5009 if ( pszItemName )
5010 {
5011 // try to match by name.
5012 if ( !strcmp( pszItemName, STRING( pWeapon->pev->classname ) ) )
5013 {
5014 // match!
5015 break;
5016 }
5017 }
5018 else
5019 {
5020 // trying to drop active item
5021 if ( pWeapon == m_pActiveItem )
5022 {
5023 // active item!
5024 break;
5025 }
5026 }
5027
5028 pWeapon = pWeapon->m_pNext;
5029 }
5030
5031
5032 // if we land here with a valid pWeapon pointer, that's because we found the
5033 // item we want to drop and hit a BREAK; pWeapon is the item.
5034 if ( pWeapon )
5035 {
5036 if ( !g_pGameRules->GetNextBestWeapon( this, pWeapon ) )
5037 return; // can't drop the item they asked for, may be our last item or something we can't holster
5038
5039 UTIL_MakeVectors ( pev->angles );
5040
5041 pev->weapons &= ~(1<<pWeapon->m_iId);// take item off hud
5042
5043 CWeaponBox *pWeaponBox = (CWeaponBox *)CBaseEntity::Create( "weaponbox", pev->origin + gpGlobals->v_forward * 10, pev->angles, edict() );
5044 pWeaponBox->pev->angles.x = 0;
5045 pWeaponBox->pev->angles.z = 0;
5046 pWeaponBox->PackWeapon( pWeapon );
5047 pWeaponBox->pev->velocity = gpGlobals->v_forward * 300 + gpGlobals->v_forward * 100;
5048
5049 // drop half of the ammo for this weapon.
5050 int iAmmoIndex;
5051
5052 iAmmoIndex = GetAmmoIndex ( pWeapon->pszAmmo1() ); // ???
5053
5054 if ( iAmmoIndex != -1 )
5055 {
5056 // this weapon weapon uses ammo, so pack an appropriate amount.
5057 if ( pWeapon->iFlags() & ITEM_FLAG_EXHAUSTIBLE )
5058 {
5059 // pack up all the ammo, this weapon is its own ammo type
5060 pWeaponBox->PackAmmo( MAKE_STRING(pWeapon->pszAmmo1()), m_rgAmmo[ iAmmoIndex ] );
5061 m_rgAmmo[ iAmmoIndex ] = 0;
5062
5063 }
5064 else
5065 {
5066 // pack half of the ammo
5067 pWeaponBox->PackAmmo( MAKE_STRING(pWeapon->pszAmmo1()), m_rgAmmo[ iAmmoIndex ] / 2 );
5068 m_rgAmmo[ iAmmoIndex ] /= 2;
5069 }
5070
5071 }
5072
5073 return;// we're done, so stop searching with the FOR loop.
5074 }
5075 }
5076}
5077
5087BOOL CBasePlayer::HasPlayerItem( CBasePlayerItem *pCheckItem )
5088{
5089 CBasePlayerItem *pItem = m_rgpPlayerItems[pCheckItem->iItemSlot()];
5090
5091 while (pItem)
5092 {
5093 if (FClassnameIs( pItem->pev, STRING( pCheckItem->pev->classname) ))
5094 {
5095 return TRUE;
5096 }
5097 pItem = pItem->m_pNext;
5098 }
5099
5100 return FALSE;
5101}

5146 {
5147 return FALSE;
